texts.es: Hermes, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 32 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa y dos hijos actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  realizar una siembra de tomate, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Hermes is an enterprising man who’s 32 years old and married. He lives with his wife and two children. He’s asking for a loan to plant tomatoes. His final goal is to maintain good growing conditions throughout the season so that he can get a good quality crop. His only limitation is that he needs money to continue farming since this business depends on having funds in order to move ahead. For that reason he’s requested a loan. It’s his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He hasn’t gotten loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has allowed him to take out a loan with much ease and with a very low interest rate.

loans.use: to plant tomatoes.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Zedekiah

texts.en:
Zedekiah is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be determined and focused. He operates a bicycle repair business where he repairs customers' bicycles. 

He will use the 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy a water tank that will benefit four family members. The family faces a challenge of lack of enough storage facilities. They will be able to store enough water for domestic use. 

He hopes that in the future, he will sustain himself. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of 10,000 KES was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water tank for water storage.

loans.name: Amiran

texts.en:
Amiran is a 51-year-old married man who lives in the small village of Tsirkvali with his wife, two sons, daughter-in-law and a grandchild. Amiran is welder. He works at the local area and gets a monthly salary. His younger son is a taxi driver, and the elder works as a laborer at the warehouse located near their house. They earn monthly income as well. 

Amiran and his family members work hard all day long to earn a living, but their existing income is not enough to cover food and everyday expenses of such a large family. That is why Amiran decided to start his own business. All of the financial institutions rejected his loan requests because of his unstable financial conditions and lack of experience. After several unsuccessful attempts, Amiran applied for credit from MFO Credo. His request was approved in the framework of a Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva. This program enables the vulnerable poor to start or re-start businesses. 

A loan of $2,800 will help him to purchase a minibus. Once the minibus is purchased, he will work on the minibus line and increase the family income. With the increased income, he will be able to improve the living conditions of his family members.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus and work on a minibus line.

loans.name: Kai

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is Kai. She is in her late forties and is from Lunsar northern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with two children. One of her daughters is currently going to school. 

Kai runs a general stock business at her house; she sells sweets, biscuits and milk. She has been running this business for over 20 years. She works at the business throughout the week, from morning to night. At present, she is faced with insufficient capital to expand her business.

Kai has requested a loan in order to buy more food commodities like milk, sweets, sugar and biscuits. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her family. In the future, she plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more food commodities like milk, sweets, sugar and biscuits.

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
María Santos tiene 24 años de edad está casada y tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales 2 están en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación y los otros dos en casa ya que están muy pequeños. Ella se dedica a la agricultura en lo que es la siembra y cultivo de maíz, frijol, yuca y café. Ella aprendió dichas actividades en compañía desde muy joven ya sus padres y su familia son agricultores siendo una tradición. Tiene un grado de educación primaria completo la cual pudo cursar gracias al apoyo brindado por sus padres. En la agricultura especialmente con el café es un producto delicado y de no tratarse a tiempo con los insumos necesario puede perderse la cosecha completa.

Es por ello que ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL con el cual planea comprar 8 bolsas de nutrí café, 7 bolsas de abono 18-46-0, 6 bolsas de urea, 7 bolsas de abono foliar y 3 litros de ALTO 10 SL con los cuales mantendrá segura y sana su cosecha.

Sus metas a largo plazo son las de ampliar sus cultivos de café con la compra de más tierra, sembrar una variedad de café más competitiva y tecnificar sus cultivos. Sus sueños es mediante a los ingresos darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, mejores oportunidades de estudio de las que ella tuvo en su juventud dando la oportunidad a sus hijos de enviarlos a la universidad para que sean personas de provecho.
texts.en:
María Santos is 24 years old. She is married and has four children. Two are in different grades in primary school and the other two are still at home since they are very young. She works in agriculture planting and cultivating corn, beans, cassava and coffee. She learned these activities at a very young age as agriculture is a tradition for her family and her relatives. She was able to complete primary school thanks to the support of her parents. 

Agriculture, especially coffee, is a delicate product and if not treated in a timely fashion with the necessary supplies the entire crop can be lost. This is why she has asked for funding through COMIXMUL in order to buy 8 bags of nutrí café, 7 bags of 18-46-0 compost, 6 bags of urea, 7 bags of foliar compost and 3 liters of ALTO 10 SL with which to keep her harvest safe and healthy.

Her goal in the long run is to expand her coffee crops by buying more land, growing a variety of coffee to be more competitive and improving her growing techniques.

Her dream is through her income to provide her family with a better quality of life and offer better study opportunities than she had when she was a youth so that she can send her children to university so they can gain advantages.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Tahminakhon

texts.ru: Тахминахон добродушная женщина. Ей 31 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. В 2000 году она успешно окончила среднюю школу, но по семейному состоянию она не смогла поступить в университет. Она вышла замуж и родила 3 детей. 13 лет она была домохозяйкой и занималась воспитанием детей. Ее старания и любовь к учебе заставила ее после 13 лет поступить в университет. Она поступила в Худжандский Государственный Университет. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Tahminakhon is a good-natured woman of 31 years of age.  She is married and is raising three children.   She successsfully graduated from secondary school in 2000 but, due to family circumstances, she could not go to university.  She got married and bore three children.  For 13 years she was a housewife and spent her time raising her children.  But after 13 years, her diligence and love for education have made her enroll at Khujand State University.  She needs to pay her tuition, but does not have the money.  She is relying on your kindness and benevolence.

loans.use: To pay for her tuition at the university

loans.name: Bienvenido 2 Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BIENVENIDO II”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María Eugenia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mandiles, venta de cortinas, venta de verduras, venta de bordados de moreno, tienda de barrio, tejido de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María Eugenia es integrante, ella indica que hace siete años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de fabricación de cajas de chocolate; este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años de su cuñado, posteriormente decidió emprender su propio espacio de trabajo.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cartón) que adquirirá de las empresas distribuidoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en las fábricas de chocolate. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le trabajar en grupo.
texts.en:
Bienvenido II Communal Bank will start its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes regional office.  It's made up of eight members and governed by a board of directors of which María Eugenia's the president.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses, including apron sales, curtain sales, vegetable sales, embroidering clothing, neighborhood store, and blanket weaving.

The loan they'll get will benefit small business entrepreneurs like María Eugenia.  She says she has been a member of Pro Mujer for seven years, having joined on the invitation of a friend who's a member.  Currently she has a business making boxes for chocolate.  She set the business up several years ago with her brother-in-law, then decided to set up her own work space.

The loan she's getting is to increase her capital with a purchase of cardboard.  She'll acquire the cardboard from wholesale companies in the city of El Alto and, after making the boxes, sell them to chocolate factories.  This job allows her to generate income to support her family, because she's married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she says working in groups.

loans.use: to buy cardboard

loans.name: Asilbubu

texts.ru: Асильбубу 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывает 1 сына. Cупруг и сын помогают по хозяйству. Асильбубу в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 28 лет назад с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Асильбубу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 лошадь, 1 теленок, 10 овец, а также имеется земельная доля, размером 1,80 ГА на которой она ежегодно сажает: перец, фасоль, клевер. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асильбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку селитры для обработки земли. Доходы от кредита Асильбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Asilbubu is 61 years old and she and her husband are raising one son.  Her husband and son help her with her farm.  Her familiy's main source of income is Asilbubu's animal husbandry and farming business, which she started 28 years ago with 5,000 somi (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of her hard work, Asilbubu now has a horse, a calf, ten sheep, and 1.80 hectares of land where every year she grows peppers, beans, and clover.  Her monthly income comes to 12,000 somi (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Asilbubu applied to microfinance bank Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 somi (KGS) to buy nitrate fertilizer.  Asilbubu plans to use the income from the loan to invest in more cattle and she intends to do home repairs.

loans.use: to buy nitrate

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Don Rafael, tiene 32 años de edad, es casado y  a procreado 3 hijas, las cuales estudian; su esposa se dedica al oficio del hogar y al cuidado de las niñas. Don Rafael cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el manejo de ganado de engorde en repasto y en la agricultura, trabajo que aprendió con su padre, desde que era muy joven, ya que por su bajo nivel económico, no le ayudaron, solo estudio sexto grado. También, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, para ello debe andar por varias comunidades en busca de personas que le vendan reses, para después ir a venderle a otros clientes suyos.  

Camina varios kilómetros, por varias comunidades, todos los días en busca de personas que quieran venderle sus reses, si logra comprar algún animal, tiene que mantenerlo hasta que llega el día de tiangue, para llevarlos en camión, el viaje tarda unos 45 minutos, ahí vende y si puede también compra novillos, para repastarlos durante algún tiempo. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando es, para comprar 5 novillos para engorde en repasto. De esta manera, incrementara su hato de novillos, esto ayudara mucho a que los ingresos sean mas frecuentes.  Esta planificando ahorrar, para que sus hijas estudien y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Don Rafael is 32 years old. He is married and he has three daughters. His daughters are in school. His wife focuses on housework and taking care of the daughters. Don Rafael has 15 years of experience managing cattle and agriculture. He learned from his father from a very young age. Due to his low economic status, he only studied until sixth grade. Also, he buys and sells cattle. He has to travel between various communities in search of people who want to sell cattle and then he sells the cattle to other customers. 

He walks for kilometers through various communities every day in order to find people who want to sell their cattle. If he is able to buy an animal, he has to keep until market day. To take the animals by truck, the trip takes 45 minutes. At the market, he sells the cattle and if he is able to, he also purchases young cows in order to raise and feed them for some time. 

The requested loan will be used to purchase five young bulls to fatten on his pasture. He will increase his herd of bulls. This will help him to have more frequent profits. He is planning to save so that his daughters can study and become professionals.

loans.use: purchase five bulls to fatten on his pasture.

loans.name: Duo Mujeres Alegres De Sumpango Group

texts.es: Duo Mujeres alegres de sumpango, este grupo esta conformado por la señora Ana Maria de 25 años de edad, ella se dedica a la ealaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos desde hace 2 años, esta contenta porque los prestamos que Kiva le ha otorgado le ha sido de mucha ayuda en su negocio, en esta oportunidadad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos, ya que por la demanda de sus clientes no tiene el suficiente capital para invertir, desde ya les agradese por su ayuda y espera que le puedan seguir ayudando en su negocio.
texts.en:
Twenty five year-old Ana Maria is a member of Duo Mujeres Alegres de Sumpango. 

For the past two years she has earned a living making and selling traditional woven fabrics. She is happy because her previous Kiva loans have greatly helped her business. 

On this occasion she is requesting a loan to purchase raw materials to make and sell traditional woven fabrics because she does not have sufficient capital to meet her clients' orders. 

She thanks you in advance and hopes that you can continue to assist her in her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make and sell traditional woven fabrics.

loans.name: Mapendo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Bisimwa est membre du collectif  d’affaire  « Mapendo», entrepreneur expérimentée et  mère de 3 enfants qui étudient. La cliente s’est déjà spécialisée dans la vente de clous. Elle a choisi être operateur d’un seul article,  faute d’un capital suffisant.  Elle installe ses articles au marché central. Elle commença ses affaires avec  son fonds propre reçu de  son mari, il y a environ 7 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter 10 sacs de  clous. Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son entreprise en y ajoutant d’autres articles de construction, scolariser, nourrir ses enfants.  La carence de ces articles (clous) sur le marché local est un grand défi. Parfois, en cas de pénurie, elle traverse au Rwanda pour s’approvisionner. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour son soutien en microcrédit aux petits entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
Bisimwa is a member of the Mapendo business group. She is an experienced entrepreneur and a mother of three children, who all go to school. 

Bisimwa specializes in selling nails. She chose to sell this single item, because she lacks sufficient capital. She displays her goods in a central market. She started this business about seven years ago with money that she received from her husband. 

This new loan will go towards buying ten bags of nails. 

A big challenge is when the local markets have run out of nails. Sometimes, in these cases, she will go to Rwanda to buy some.

Bisimwa wishes to expand her business and sell other types of products. In addition she would like to [continue] educating and feeding her children.

Finally, Bisimwa strongly thanks Hekima for their lending support to small-scale entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy ten bags of nails

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Kelvin Selso

texts.es:
Kelvin tiene 24 años de edad, trabaja como obrero de un fundo agrícola y con su trabajo solventa los gastos de su hogar, ya que es padre de un pequeño de 5 años, a quien quiere mucho. 

Kelvin está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le están brindando podrá comprar una refrigeradora, así podrá conservar sus alimentos de mejor manera y evitara que sus alimentos se malogren. Así Kelvin seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Mejorar en su trabajo y poder seguir creciendo”.
texts.en:
Kelvin, age 24, works as a laborer on a farm.  With his work he pays the household expenses.  He has a little five year old, whom he loves very much.

Kelvin is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the support they are giving him, he will be able to buy a refrigerator.  This way he will be able to preserve his food in a better way and keep his food from spoiling.

Kelvin will keep struggling in order to be able to make his biggest dream come true.  His dream is to improve in his work and to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en: Oretha is 49 years old, and lives in Montserrado County which is the largest commercial county in Liberia. She is a single with seven children, between ages 20 and 33. They live on their own and attend college. Oretha did not attend school but manages her business well. For the past 20 years she has been in business; presently she is selling onions, plantains, ed-does, etc. in the local market. She started this business with money from her mother four years ago and enjoys it because it gives her more money. She sells six days a week, from 7am to 5pm. Most of the time she uses taxis to get her goods to her shop. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food for resale. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more onions, plantains, ed-does, etc..

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, es madre soltera y disfruta de tres hijos de 20, 23 y 25 años de edad. Ella, se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de granos básicos, tales como; maíz y frijol, también a la crianza de ganado, dicha actividad la desempeña desde hace 25 años, oficio que lo aprendió con sus padres y lo realiza todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm, para esta actividad contrata dos personas de manera temporal para que le ayuden.
El préstamo que solicita  le servirá para comprar materiales de construcción, tales como: hierro, cemento, arena, piedra y pago de mano de obra; esta inversión le ayudara a terminar de construir su vivienda para tener una vida con mejores condiciones.
La Sra. Blanca sueña con tener su casa terminada y apoyar a su familia con los gastos económicos.
texts.en:
Blanca's a single mother who has three children, ages 20, 23, and 25.  She makes a living in agriculture growing staples such as corn and beans.  For 25 years she also has raised livestock, a job she learned from her father.  She works at this from 6 a.m. until 3 p.m. and hires seasonal workers to help her.

The loan she's requesting is to buy construction supplies such as rebar, cement, sand, and stone, and to pay for labor.  This investment will help her finish building her house so she has better living conditions.

Blanca dreams of finishing her house and supporting her family's household expenses.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies and to pay for labor

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela, cuenta con 61 años de edad, es viuda con 6 hijos. Elle pertenese a un grupo familiar bastante numeroso con su madre y sus demás hermanas eran las encargadas de llevar los alimentos a sus hermanos y padre, quienes de dedicaban a la agricultura en ocasiones tenían que trabajar cuando el trabajo era bastante y sus hermanos no daban abasto.

A sus 20 años se caso de esta unión procrearon 6 hijos con mucho esfuerzo y mucho trabajo ella y su esposo les dieron el estudio a sus hijos, solo lograron obtener un noveno grado y otros no estudiaron porque se dedicaron mas al trabajo agrícola, dos de ellos por los problemas del conflicto armado emigraron a los Estados Unidos; quienes lograron formar su propia familia en dicho lugar, sus otros 4 se quedaron en el hogar y con el tiempo se acompañaron formando su propia familia, el menor el único que a quedado con ella quien le ayuda a los trabajos agrícolas y al cuido de los animales; ya que su esposo hace 4 años fallecido y tomo la responsabilidad de la casa.

Ella se dedica a cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, trabajando en compañía de su hijo menor y siempre pagando mosos para terminar. La agricultura lo ha echo desde hace varios años cuando su esposo estaba vivo, el trabajo lo realiza a un kilómetro de su casa siempre que va al cultivo tiene que caminar varios minutos ya que no hay transporte para el lugar, su hijo quien siempre la apoya en el trabajo esta pendiente del cultivo.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para la compra de insumos agrícolas; abonos, fertilizantes, pago de mosos y para preparar la tierra para el cultivo, se espera favorecer mejor el cultivo de maíz y lograr al final de la cosecha una mayor producción y  mejores ingresos para ella y su familia.

  Espera en un futuro sacar adelante a su ultimo hijo dándole la oportunidad de trabajo, ademas, comprar un terreno propio para trabajar.
texts.en:
Adela is a 61 year old widow with 6 children. She belongs to a large family where her mother and her other sisters were in charge of taking food to her brothers and father who were working in the fields and sometimes they had to help out when there was too much work and her brothers could not cope.

She got married when she was twenty and had six children and with a lot of effort and hard work she and her husband provided schooling for the children and one was able to obtain a 9th grade education, but the others could not because they worked in the fields. Two of them emigrated to the United States because of armed conflict forming their own families there while her other four stayed at home and over time started their own families. The youngest is the only one still with her and he helps her with the farming chores and caring for the animals. Her husband died four years ago and she took over the responsibility of the home.

She works growing corn on 14,000 square meters of corn, working alongside her youngest son and aways paying laborers to finish the work. She has been doing this for many years since her husband was alive. The work is a mile from her house and it takes her several minutes as there is no transport to the place. Her son always helps her work on the slopes.

She will use the loan to buy more agricultural supplies such as compost and fertilizers, and to pay laborers, and to prepare the land for cultivation. She hopes to favor the corn crops so that at harvest time she will have a better harvest and higher income for herself and her family.

She hopes in the future to help her youngest son giving him the opportunity of working and in addition to buy land of his own to work.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural supplies such as compost and fertilizers, to pay for laborers, and to prepare the land to grow corn

loans.name: Ziyada's Group

texts.en:
Ziyada's group is comprised of seven hardworking women. Ziyada is 19 years old and lives in the town of Namutumba in the Iganga region of Uganda. For the past two years, Ziyada has been working hard to manage her boutique, where she sells clothes. 

To help expand her business, Ziyada has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more skirts to sell, and will help Ziyada to generate greater profits. This will help her improve her standard of living and live a self-reliant life. Ziyada hopes that in the future she will be able to buy a plot of land. 

Ziyada is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more skirts to sell.

loans.name: Babo

texts.en:
Babo lives in the village of Sanakhshire, Zestaponi District, West Georgia. She is 67 years old, retired and receiving a pension from the local government. Babo is running the agricultural business for the family. They own two milk cows and one pig and sell the dairy products in a nearby town's open market. The family earns additional income through the sale of wine and vodka produced by grapes harvested from their family-owned 300 vines. 
Babo lives with her family: her grown son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. She requested credit to purchase sheep. She will start selling lambs in a nearby town's open market as well. The income of the family will increase. In the future, Babo plans to reinvest part of the income in the sheep-breeding business for its further development. The other part of the increased income will be used to improve the daily living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to start sheep breeding.

loans.name: Jhonny Vidal

texts.es:
Jhonny es un hombre de 30 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, Jhonny trabaja en el área de cocina de una pastelería de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y buen desempeño.
Jhonny se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada mejorará su vivienda, ya que desea comprar materiales de construcción para reforzar y asegurar la parte trasera de su hogar, así pues Jhonny seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura y adecuada que brinda mayor bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Jhonny, age 30, lives with his wife and small child in the city of Chincha.  He is a very nice, hard-working, and enthusiastic person.  He puts all of his efforts into getting his family ahead.

On his own initiative, Jhonny works in the kitchen of a bakery in his city.  He works every day for approximately 12 hours.  He believes that it is going well for him because of his dedication and good performance.

Jhonny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help provided, he will improve his house.  He wishes to buy construction materials to reinforce the back part of his house to make it more secure.  Jhonny will continue working and putting forth great effort in order to fulfill his big dream of having a safe and adequate house that provides his family with greater well-being.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 30 years old and married with two children, ages five and 13. She runs a retail business in Port Loko in the northern part of Sierra Leone.

She's been in this business since 2002 and sells plastic slippers within a busy market area. She says that her business is doing well.

Emma requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more slippers for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her support her children and take care of her family. In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more slippers for resale.

loans.name: Ja`afr

texts.en: Ja`afr is a 21-year-old single man who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is always alert to opportunities and has worked really hard over the past three years in his small store which is located in the city. He has been running a store selling spices and perfumes because he noticed that there wasn't one in his area. This is one of the reasons for the success of his business. He feels proud of himself and of what he is accomplishing with his business. He has a small house for which he needs money to buy construction supplies. He took out a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB. He will use this loan to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for his house.

loans.name: Dieudonne Group

texts.fr:
Mme PAULINE 2ème JUMELLE représente le groupe DIEUDONNE. Mariée, elle mère de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 11ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. 02vont à l’école.
Mme est coiffeuse et vend aussi des mèches depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10. Ses clients sont les voisins et amies.
Elle veut s’acheter 20paquets de tissage.
Mme veut économiser ses bénéfices pour s’acheter un terrain (parcelle) et construire. Elle ambitionne agrandir son commerce et payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Pauline 2ème Jumelle represents the Dieudonne group. She is married and mother to four children. The eldest of her children is 11 years old and the youngest three; two of them go to school.

Pauline is a hairdresser and has also been selling hair extensions for the past ten years. She gets her supplies from the Sector 10 market. Her customers are neighbors and friends. She would like to buy 20 packets of hair weaves. 

She wants to save her profits to buy a plot of land to build on. Her ambition is to expand her business and pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 20 packets of hair weaves.

loans.name: Salama Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kalume  est trésorière  d’une association de crédit « Salama »,  jeune entrepreneur, expérimentée, âgée de 30 ans  et mère de 4 enfants qui étudient tous. La cliente est vendeuse de haricots. Son conjoint est un petit  commerçant de divers.  Elle installe ses marchandises au marché central et parfois,  à son domicile. Elle commença ses affaires avec  son fonds propre reçu de son mari. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le soutien financier du projet de microcrédit de Hekima. Il y a environ 12 ans, elle exerce ce business. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter 8 sacs de haricots. Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son entreprise, scolariser, nourrir et achever la constriction de sa maison. Pendant les saisons de récolte, son commerce avance bien, par contre pendant de moment de culture, le prix hausse chez les agriculteurs.  Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour son soutien en microcrédit aux petits entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: The customer, Kalume, is the treasurer of the Salama loan association. She is a young experienced entrepreneur who is 30 years old and mother to four children who are all at school. The customer sells beans. Her husband is a small trader of various products. She sells her goods in the central market and sometimes from home. She began her business with her own capital which she was given by her husband. Later on, she was able to benefit from financial support from Hekima's microloan program. She has been carrying out this business for around 12 years. This new loan will be used to buy eight sacks of beans. By doing this she would like to expand her business as well as educate and feed her children and finish constructing her house. During the harvest seasons, her business does well but during the growing period the farmers' prices rise. Finally she is extremely grateful to Hekima for its support in the form of microloans for small entrepreneurs who are not able to access banks.

loans.use: to buy eight sacks of beans.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Âgée de 45ans, Ablavi vit avec ses 03 enfants et leur père à Lomé. Tous scolarisés. Pour contribuer aux besoins de la famille, elle revend depuis 1991 des charbons de bois et des céréales dans un quartier de la ville de Lomé. Afin de mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients, elle sollicite son second prêt à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Le profit tiré de la vente permettra d'améliorer son chiffre d'affaire et d'améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en: Ablavi is 45 years old and lives with her three children and their father in Lomé. The children are all at school. In order to be able to contribute to providing for the family's needs, she has since 1991 been selling charcoal and cereals in a district of Lomé. In order to be able to satisfy customer demand more easily, she is requesting her second loan from WAGES so that she can buy goods. The profits she makes from her sales will enable her to increase her turnover and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal and cereals.

loans.name: Badenya Group

texts.fr:
Mme KOROTIMI représente le groupe BADENYA. Mariée, elle mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgé a 25ans et le moins âgé a 18 ans. 01va à l’école.
Mme vend de la farine de manioc (placali) depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne en Côte d’Ivoire. Ses clients sont celles qui fabriquent (transforment) l’atiéké (couscous de manioc.
Elle veut s’acheter 04sacs et ½ de farine de manioc (placali)
Mme veut ouvrir un compte d’épargner avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
Korotimi represents the Badenya group. She is married and mother to three children. The eldest of the children is 25 years old and the youngest 18. Only one goes to school. Korotimi has been selling cassava flour ("placali") for the past ten years. She gets her supplies from the Ivory Coast. Her customers are women who make "atiéké" (cassava couscous) from the flour.

She would like to buy four and a half sacks of cassava flour. She would like to open a savings account with her profits and her ambition is to build up her business.

loans.use: to buy four and a half sacks of cassava flour ("placali")

loans.name: Sisiwegbe Group

texts.fr: SISIWEGBE est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies d'un même quartier et qui font des tontines ensemble. La représente du groupe, nommée Émilienne(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgé de 32 ans. Émilienne a très peu fréquenté l’école. Émilienne est marié à un certain Patrick. Le couple a deux enfants. Émilienne vit seule avec ses enfants. Les charges du ménage sont assurées par le couple. Pour ce faire, Émilienne vend des épices et divers articles(biscuit, lait, savons) à son domicile depuis trente ans. Émilienne s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle Émilienne s’associe aux autres membres du groupe SISIWEGBE pour solliciter un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: Sisiwegbe is a group of three people who are friends from the same district and who have created a "tontine" between themselves (a "tontine" is a revolving finance system whereby each group member contributes periodically an agreed amount and this is passed on in rotation to the other members). The representative of the group, whose name is Emilienne (she is the one with her hand raised in the photo) is 32 years old. She went to school very little and is now married to a man called Patrick. The couple has two children. Emilienne lives alone with her children. The couple cover the various household expenses between them. In order to do this Emilienne has been selling spices and various other products (biscuits, milk, soaps) from home for the past 30 years. She gets her supplies in a Benin market. With the goal of building up her business and creating customer loyalty, Emilienne has joined forces with the other members of the Sisiwegbe group to request a first loan from Alidé.

loans.use: to buy spices and other products (biscuits, milk, soaps).

loans.name: Haticha

texts.ru: Хатича добросовестный человек. Ей 36 лет, замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Более  15 лет она занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как арбуз, пшеницу, лук и т.п. Полученный доход она продает на рынке. Так как у нее высококачественный урожай, так и ее товары имеют большой спрос. Ее муж Саидмурод помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. С целью улучшения условия проживания, она хочет отремонтировать свой дом, а для этого она должна купить строительные материалы, как цемент, древесину и т.п. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США, чтобы купить строительные материалы.  Она нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Haticha is a conscientious woman. She is 36 years old and raising four children. She has worked with growing crops, such as watermelon, wheat and onion, for more than 15 years. She sells the harvest at the market. As her harvest is of high quality, her goods are in large demand. Her husband, Saidmurod, helps her with managing the business. 

With an aim to improve their living conditions, Haticha would like to repair her house. For this she needs to purchase building materials such as cement, wood etc. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,000 US dollar in order to purchase building materials. She needs and hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials, such as cement and wood, for repairing her house

loans.name: Elsy Noemy

texts.es:
Elsy es una mujer de 33 años de edad, esta acompañada, madre de dos hijos de 7 y 10 años los que se encuentran estudiando. Ella no tiene ningún grado educacional, su compañero de vida trabaja en la agricultura y jornaleando. 
. 
ella se dedica al a agricultura, al igual que su compañero de vida. Dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 15 años, la cual la aprendió de sus padres, también presta servicio  jornaleando en un cañal la cual se tarda 10 minutos para llegar al trabajo y se transporta en una bicicleta, donde trabaja de 7:00 am a 11:00 am y devenga un salario de $5 diarios.

Necesita el crédito para la compra  de 1 bolsa de semilla de maíz , 5 sacos de fertilizantes y pesticidas, para realizar su cultivo. Ella sueña con tener su propia vivienda ,ademas espera sacar adelante académica mente a sus dos hijos , gracias al préstamo podrá tener una buena producción en su cultivo el cual le generara mejores ingresos a su familia y con las ganancias  espera hacerle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Elsy is a 33-year-old woman who has a partner and two children, ages 7 and 10, who are studying. She has no education, and her life partner works in agriculture and day labor.

She makes a living in agriculture, as does her life partner. She has been doing this for 15 years, and learned it from her parents. She also provides day labor services on a canal. It takes 10 minutes for her to get to work and she rides a bicycle there. She works from 7:00 am to 11:00 am and receives a salary of $5 a day.

She needs the loan to purchase one bag of corn seed, five sacks of fertilizer, and pesticides, to cultivate her crops. She dreams of having her own home. She also hopes to get her two children ahead academically. Thanks to the loan she will be able to have good crop production, which will generate better income for her family, and with her earnings she hopes to make improvements to their home.

loans.use: to buy a bag of corn seed, five sacks of fertilizer, and pesticide, to cultivate her crops

loans.name: Milagro De La Paz

texts.es:
La señora Milagro , cuenta con 40 años de edad, estudio hasta 4º grado ,es acompañada y su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y en los días libres  se dedica a la venta de helados en una motocicleta, se traslada a los cantones cercanos. Sus hijos que son dos de 10 y 12 años, estudian  y si conviven en la misma casa , los cuales de penden de ellos.
. 
De igual manera, la señora efectuá actividades para apoyar a los gastos de la casa, en lo relacionado a la agricultura y venta de helados. Dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 15 y 6 años consecutiva mente; las aprendió de sus padres, elle viaja a pie un km hasta donde toma el autobús que transita 20 minutos para llegar a donde compra la mercadería (helados)  


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es  para la compra  de 1 bolsa de semilla de maíz , 5 sacos de fertilizantes, pesticidas y el resto para surtir la venta  de helados . Podrá tener  una  mejor cosecha  y mejores ingresos económicos para su familia.

Su  sueño es  ampliar el negocio de los helados ,ademas espera sacar adelante académica mente sus dos hijos , gracias al préstamo podrá tener una buena producción en su cultivo y surtir las ventas de helados de su esposo ,el cual le generara mejores ingresos a su familia y con las ganancias  espera ampliar el negocio de los helados y hacerle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Milagro is 40 years old and has a 4th grade education.  She is married, and her husband is a farmer.  On his free days, he also sells ice cream from a motorcycle, driving around the nearby cantons.  They have 2 dependent children, aged 10 and 12, who attend school and live with them in their home.  

Milagro also works to support the household expenses.  She farms and sells ice cream.  She's been farming for the last 15 years, and selling ice cream for the last 6 years.  She learned this work from her parents.  She walks 1 kilometer where she gets on a bus for a 20 minute ride to get to the place where she buys the ice cream. 

The loan that she is requesting will be used to buy a sack of corn seeds, 5 sacks of fertilizers, and pesticides.  She will use the rest of the money to buy ice cream to sell.  This way, she will be able to have a better harvest, and generate more income for her family.

Milagro's dream is to expand her ice cream business.  She also hopes to get her sons educated.  Thanks to this loan, she will have a good harvest of crops, and she will be able to increase her husband's ice cream sales, which will generate more income for her family.  With these earnings, she hopes to expand her ice cream business and make improvements to her house.

loans.use: to buy a sack of corn seeds, 5 sacks of fertilizers, pesticides and ice cream to sell.

loans.name: Oral

texts.ru: Земля является основным источником бизнеса и основной кормилицей в Таджикистане. Многие люди в примере Орал  занимаются земледелием и получают доход для проживания. Более 10  лет он занимается скотоводством и земледелием. Ему 41 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4  детей. Дети несовершеннолетние и они еще не имеют нормального источника дохода. Он является основным кормильцем в семье. Он с удовольствием работает на поле с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Он планирует развевать бизнес, но  не имеет денег для покупки семена и минерального удобрения и 2 голов скота. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 15000 сомони для покупки семена, 2 голов скота и минерального удобрения. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
The soil is the main source of business and the main provider in Tajikistan. Many people, such as Oral, work with agriculture to get income for subsistence. 

Oral has worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation. He is 41 years old. He is married and raising four children. The children are not adults and they don't have a regular source of income yet. Oral is the only breadwinner in the family. He happily works in the field from early morning to late evening. 

Oral plans to develop his business, but he does not have money for purchasing seeds, mineral fertilizers and two heads of cattle. He requests a loan in the amount of 15,000 somoni to purchase seeds, two heads of cattle and mineral fertilizers. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and two heads of cattle for his business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase condiments, corn, and 'gari' to sell

loans.name: Adjodekon 2 Group

texts.fr: ADJODEKON 2 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et font des tontines ensemble. La représente du groupe, nommée T. Catherine(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 47 ans. T. Catherine n'a pas fréquenté l’école. T. Catherine est mariée à un maçon du nom de Paul. Le couple a deux enfants, aucun des enfants n'est scolarisés et un est à leur charge. T. Catherine seule avec ses enfants. Les charges du ménage sont assurées par T. Catherine. Pour répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de ses enfants, T. Catherine vend des assiettes de façon ambulante depuis dix ans. T. Catherine vend également des glacières. T. Catherine s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de diversifier son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle T. Catherine s’associe aux autres membres du groupe ADJODEKON 2 pour solliciter un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
"ADJODEKON 2" is a group composed of three persons who are friends participating in tontines together. The group's representative, T. Catherine (with her hand raised in the photo) is 47 years old. She did not attend school, and she is married to a mason named Paul. The couple have two children, of whom neither are in school, but one is in their care. T. Catherine [takes care of] her children by herself. She ensures that the household expenses are covered. To meet her children's needs with too much difficulty, she has been hawking plates for ten years. She also sells coolers (insulated containers). She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

With the goal of diversifying her business and earning a loyal customer base, T. Catherine joined with the other members of the group "ADJODEKON 2" to request a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to purchase plates and coolers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Kauser

texts.en:
Kauser is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of three children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education. Kauser with her husband (who is also shown in the photo) has been doing agriculture work since many years ago. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. Her husband assists her by watering the soil in growing the various crops of good quality. 

In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides, Kauser applied a loan of 25,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). This will help her to grow more crops, which ultimately will help in generating more cash. She dreams to provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Yaritza Yurie

texts.es: Doña yaritza es madre de dos hijos de las edades de 15 y 9 años, quienes cursan la escuela primaria y secundaria respectivamente. Yaritza maneja una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación, la que atiende día y noche. En vista de que en la actualidad tiene muy pocos productos en venta, solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio como gaseosas, granos básicos, cereales, pollo, carne y reposterías. Todos los productos mencionados anteriormente son los que sus clientes demandan de la pulpería. Esta inversión le permitirá restablecer sus ventas y poder cumplir con los gastos del hogar y la escuela de sus hijos, que es muy importante para ella.
texts.en:
Doña Yaritza is the mother of two children, ages 15 and 9, who are in primary and secondary school respectively. She manages a small store in her home during the day and at night. Given that she currently has few products to sell, Yaritza is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her business. She will buy sodas, basic grains, cereals, chicken, meat, and pastries. All of these products are demanded by her customers when they come to her store.

This investment will allow her to reestablish her sales so that she can cover her household expenses and her children’s education, which is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy sodas, basic grains, cereals, chicken, meat, and pastries.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилором трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Двое из детей совершеннолетние и один еще не совершеннолетний и учится в средней школе. Дилором является основной кормилицей семьи, так как ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Дилором более 5 лет занимается услугой швеи. После окончания средней школы она обучилась у портнихи шитью и кройки. Дилором шьёт национальные женские платья и национальный матрас «курпача». Она имеет умелые руки. Дилором должна купить школьные принадлежности и школьную форму для своего ребенка, но не имеет денег. До начала школьного года осталась немного времени, а она еще не купила еще ничего. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки школьной формы и школьных принадлежностей. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Dilorom is a hard working woman. She is 40 years old. She is married and has three children. Two of the children are adults and one is still not adult and goes to high school. Dilorom is the only breadwinner in the family, as her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation. 

For more than 5 years, Dilorom has provided a sewing service. After finishing high school she was trained at a dressmaker in sewing and cutting. Dilorom sews women's national dresses and the national mattress "Kurpacha". She has skilled hands. 

Dilorom should purchase school supplies and a school uniform for her child, but does not have the money. There is very little time left till the school year starts and she still has not bought anything. She requests a loan in the amount of 7,500 somoni to purchase a school uniform and school supplies. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To buy a school uniform and school supplies for her child

loans.name: Gloire A Dieu 2 Group

texts.fr: GLOIRE A DIEU 2 est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui font des tontines ensemble. La représente du groupe, nommée Fifamè Chantal(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 29 ans. Fifamè Chantal a fréquenté l’école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. Fifamè Chantal est marié à un certain Élie. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés. Fifamè Chantal vit avec son mari et ses enfants. Les charges du ménage sont assurées par le couple. Pour ce faire, Fifamè Chantal vend du poisson, des condiments et des liqueurs dans sa région depuis un an. Fifamè Chantal s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, et de fidéliser sa clientèle Fifamè Chantal s’associe aux autres membres du groupe GLOIRE A DIEU 2 pour solliciter un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
"GLOIRE A DIEU 2" is a group composed of three persons who participate in tontines together. The group's representative,  Fifamè Chantal (with her hand raised in the photo) is 29 years old. She has attended middle school, and she is married to a man named Élie. The couple have four children, not all in school. Fifamè Chantal lives with her husband and children. The household expenses are covered by the couple. To do so, Fifamè Chantal has been selling fish, condiments, and liqueurs in her regions for a year. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

With the goal of bolstering her business and earning a loyal customer base, Fifamè Chantal joined with the other members of the group "GLOIRE A DIEU 2" to request a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to purchase fish, condiments, and liqueurs to sell

loans.name: Potola

texts.en:
Potola is 57 years old. She lives in Tskaltubo District with her retired spouse, grown son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Potola is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, she has two milk cows and produces cheese with the received milk, which is sold locally. Potola also grows greens on the plot of land and sells the harvest locally. She is very hardworking and the type of person who puts family first. 

With this loan, Potola will purchase all the building materials for a greenhouse. After the greenhouse is built properly, Potola will grow greens and various vegetables. The harvested products will be sold for a good price. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the family income, and all members will improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse.

loans.name: Faustin

texts.en:
Faustin is 30 years old. He is single and has been growing rice as his career for the past 14 years. With a Kiva loan, he would like to buy more fertilizers for use in the rice production. The profits from the produce will be used to buy more items that are essential for use at his home.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers for use during rice production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy construction materials

loans.name: Khaliskhan

texts.ru: Халисхан 73 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитала 4 детей. Дочерей выдала замуж. Сыновей женила. Старший сын Халисхан - инвалид 2 группы. Халисхан имеет высшее педагогическое образование. В течении 30 лет проработала преподавателем в местной школе, неустанно воспитывая подрастающее поколение. Халисхан известна как принципиальный, честный и добросердечный человек. Большой опыт и преданность своему делу позволили Халисхан заслужить большой авторитет среди сельчан. Выйдя на пенсию Халисхан решила не сидеть сложав руки и с 2003 года в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, начала свой бизнес в увеличении поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве, а также полеводством. Стартовав с 6,000 сом (KGS), на сегодняшний день её хозяйство приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 8,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве у Халисхан имеется: 2 дойные коровы с приплодом. Также имеет земельный надел размером 0,51 ГА, где в основном выращивает: картофель,лук, перец, кукурузу. Доходы от бизнеса Халисхан вложила в увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве. Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Халисхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на закупку коровы. Доходы от кредита Халисхан планирует использовать для увеличения поголовья скота, а также намерена в будущем купить квартиру для сына.
texts.en:
Khaliskhan is 73 years old, married and has raised four children together with husband. Her daughters and sons are married. Khaliskhan's eldest son has a disability. 

Khaliskhan has higher pedagogical education. For a period of 30 years she worked as a teacher at the local school, relentlessly bringing up the younger generation. Khaliskhan is known as a principal, honest and good-hearted person. Her long experience and dedication to her work earned Khaliskhan great respect among the villagers. 

When retiring, Khaliskhan decided to not sit back, and since 2003, searching for a source of income for her family, she started her business of livestock breeding on her farm, and also doing field crop cultivation. After having started with 6,000 som (KGS), her business currently brings in a monthly income in the amount of 8,000 som (KGS). Khaliskhan has two dairy cows with offspring on her farm. She also has a plot of land of 0.51 hectares, where she mainly grows potato, onion, peppers and sweet corn. Khaliskhan invested the income from the business in increasing the number of cattle on her farm. 

To further develop her business, Khaliskhan turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of cows. Khaliskhan plans to spend the income from the loan on increasing the number of cattle, and in the future she also intends to purchase an apartment for her son.

loans.use: to purchase cows

loans.name: Uguloy

texts.ru: Угулой сельская женщина, живет и трудится в районе Пяндж на юге страны. Ей 47 лет. Она занимается сельским хозяйством и животноводством. Угулой замужем, имеет троих детей. Ее муж пастух. Сама Угулой является земледельцем, а также занимается куплей и продажей скота. Угулой более 7 лет выращивает крупнорогатый и мелкорогатый скот. Ей помогает муж. Сейчас она просит кредит для закупа овец для увеличения поголовья мелкорогатого скота. Угулой целеустремленный человек. Прибыль с бизнеса она планирует потратить на расширение своего животноводческого бизнеса.
texts.en:
Uguloy is a village woman, who lives and works in the Pyandj region in the south of the country. She is 47 years old. She works with farming and livestock breeding. Uguloy is married and has three children. Her husband is a shepherd. Uguloy works with field crop cultivation and also with animal sales. 

Uguloy has worked with raising cattle, sheep and goats for more than 7 years. Her husband helps her. Currently she requests a loan to purchase sheep for increasing their number. Uguloy is a purposeful woman. She plans to spend the income from the business on expanding her livestock business.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for developing her business

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel, a sus 33 años, vive en unión libre con su pareja y no tiene hijos. Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agropecuarias. Gracias a esto, hoy en día se dedica a criar y comercializar cerdos; sus principales clientes son amigos y vecinos del pueblo donde reside y en veredas cercanas; de esta manera ha logrado obtener los ingresos necesarios para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar. El cliente es un señor pujante, emprendedor, trabaja con esmero para tener la oportunidad de progresar; esto lo motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar más lechones para continuar con su labor, cuidarlos, engordarlos y luego venderlos a un mejor precio, además tendrá la posibilidad de comenzar una producción en forma escalonada, que le garantice la entrada de recursos mensualmente. Todo esto dará como resultado el incremento en la rentabilidad de su negocio y podrá disfrutar de mejores condiciones de vida al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Manuel is 33 years old. He and his partner are in a common-law relationship, but they have no children. Manuel was born and raised in the country, which is where he learned how to work on a farm. Thanks to his upbringing, he now raises and sells pigs. His main customers are friends and neighbors from the same town where he lives and also from nearby villages. Having this business enables him to earn the necessary income to pay for daily household expenses.

Manuel is a vigorous and enterprising man who works with great care so that he can have opportunities to make progress. For this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to buy more piglets so that he can continue his work. He will take care of the animals, fatten them, and then sell them at a better price. In addition, he will have the ability to scale his production, which will guarantee a monthly flow of income. All of this will result in increased profitability for his business, which will allow him and his wife to enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise.

loans.name: Techy Rocio

texts.es:
Techy es una mujer de 24 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Techy no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas.
Por iniciativa propia, Techy trabaja brindando atención al cliente en una tienda de venta de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación  y buen desempeño.
Techy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara una cocina, la cual reemplazara a su cocina de kerosene que presenta desperfectos, de esta manera ella y su familia podrán preparar adecuadamente sus alimentos, así pues Techy seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en una profesional.
texts.en:
Techy is a 24 year old single woman and lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hard working and enthusiastic person, who has a strong desire to improve her life. Unfortunately due to her lack of financial resources and her need to work, Techy was not able to study for a degree in Business Administration.

On her own initiative, Techy works around 10 hours a day providing support to customers in a shop in her city, and thinks it suits her very well thanks to her dedication and good performance. 

Techy is very grateful to Kiva loaners as thanks to the help they give her she will buy a kitchen, which will replace her kerosene kitchen which is in need of repair. This way her and her family can prepare food properly, so Techy can continue working and flighting to achieve her big dream of becoming a professional.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.es:
Epifania tiene 52 años de edad, es madre de 6 hijos, a quienes quiere mucho y ha saca adelante con mucho esfuerzo, trabajando como empleada de limpieza en una institución de su ciudad, asimismo ha iniciado su negocio de venta de productos cosméticos con lo cual tiene un dinero extra para los gastos de su hogar. 

Epifania esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder realizar el tarrajeo y refacciones de las paredes de su vivienda;  así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa”.
texts.en:
52-year old Epifania is mother to six children whom she loves very much and has worked very hard to help them get ahead. She works as a cleaner in an institution in the town and has also started her own business selling cosmetics to earn extra money to pay for household expenses.

Epifania is grateful to Kiva donors as it is thanks to their help that she will be able to buy construction materials to repair and plaster the walls of her house. This work will help improve the standard of living of her family and she will be able to work towards fulfilling  her dream of completing the construction of her house.

loans.use: Buy construction material

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 25-year-old Mabinty from Port Loko. She is married with two children, ages 1 year and 5 years. She was a housewife, but she wanted to contribute to supporting the home instead of depending on her husband alone.   

Mabinty runs a store of general stock items at her house; she sells cigarettes, milk, pure water and mayonnaise. She has been running this business since 2008. She works at the business throughout the week from morning to night. Mabinty says that at present, she is faced with insufficient capital to expand her business.

Mabinty has requested a loan in order to buy more pure water, bagged milk and drinks. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and take care of her family's welfare. In the future, she plans to open another shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more pure water, bagged milk and drinks.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 55-year-old married woman who has been running a business of milk sales with the support of her husband for many years. She has many buffaloes and cows in milk and sells their milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk. She looks after the cattle and performs the task of collecting milk from them, while her husband sells it to different places on daily basis. 

She is a mother of three and needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. In order to make huge profits, she requested a loan of 20,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy one more cow. It will help her to inflate her sales. She hopes to get an increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy one more cow.

loans.name: Annet Elon

texts.en: Annet Elon is a second time borrower from this institution who is applying for 2,000,000 UGX to complete her house that is currently unfinished. She is a widowed lady of five mature children, two of whom still live with her. She has always educated and taken care of them using income from her business of hiring out wheel carts to market vendors. From this business, she managed tear down the dilapidated house that she used to occupy with her children and start constructing another one. Though she got stuck along the way due to limited resources, she would like to complete the house and occupy it pretty soon. Therefore, she applied for the loan to give her a push towards completing the house. Her dream is to live in a fully furnished house.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.ru: Зулхумор трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и поэтому Зулхумору приходится самой справляться с домохозяйством. Она целеустремленная женщина и всегда стремится к новшеству. Зулхумор более 14 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Она введет свое дело отлично. Зулхумор занимается купле продажей рыбы. Она покупает рыбы с местного рыбака и ввезет товар в столицу. Она имеет много клиентов. Зулхумор начала свой бизнес с 700-800 сомони и постепенно увеличила свой оборотный капитал. Она планирует увеличить свой оборотный капитал и таким образом развевать бизнес дальше. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2400 сомони для покупки рыбы. Она будет использовать полученный доход от бизнеса для образования своих детей. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zulhumor is a hard working woman. She is 48 years old. She is married and raising three children. Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, and therefore Zulhumor must handle the household. She is a purposeful woman and always strives for innovation.

For more than 14 years, Zulhumor has had her own business. She manages her business perfectly well. Zulhumor works with fish selling. She purchases fish from the local fishermen and takes the goods to the capital. She has many customers. 

Zulhumor started her business with 700-800 somoni and gradually improved her working capital. She plans to increase the working capital and this way develop her business. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,400 somoni for the purchase of fish. She will spend the income received from the business son her children's education. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To purchase fish to increase the working capital

loans.name: Zilla

texts.ru: Зилла пожилая женщина в возрасте 77 лет. У нее есть муж и четверо детей. Она с мужем, сыновьями, невестками и внуками проживает в районе Пяндж. Зилла несмотря на свой пожилой возраст занимается животноводством. Она в течение 3 лет разводит крупнорогатый скот для дальнейшей продажи. Ей в деятельности помогает ее семья. Зилла любит ухаживать за скотом. В данный момент она нуждается в кредите. Она хочет приобрести одного бычка, чтобы продолжить деятельность.
texts.en:
Zilla is an elderly woman of the age of 77. She has a husband and four children. She lives in the Pyandj region with her husband, sons, daughters-in-law and grandchildren. 

Despite her old age, Zilla works with livestock breeding. She has for a period of three years bred cattle for selling. Her family helps her with the business. Zilla loves looking after cattle. Currently she needs a loan. She would like to purchase a bull-calf in order to continue her business.

loans.use: to purchase a bull-calf to continue her business

loans.name: Bendu

texts.en:
This is Bendu from Liberia. She lives in the Caldwell area in Montserrado County, which is becoming one of the most populated communities in Montserrado because of its good roads, quietness, and lower rents. Bendu is 25 years old. She is married and has an 8-year-old child, who stays at home and attends school. Her husband is a driver. She runs a table at which she sells soft drinks and biscuits. 

Bendu is asking for a loan to buy enough soft drinks and biscuits to increase her sales. She reports that lack of funds is the major problem she faces now; she started this business with a little money from her husband. Bendu enjoys her business because she earns her own money, and she is so proud of her business because it makes her independent. Her plan is to one day own a house, and see her child attend university. She appreciates the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to buy enough soft drinks and biscuits to increase her sales.

loans.name: Orozbubu

texts.ru: Орозбубу 49 лет, вместе с супругом воспитывает 3 детей. Супруг и младший сын помогают по хозяйству. Орозбубу в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается откормом телят с дальнейшей их перепродажей, стартовав 20 лет назад с покупки скота на 6,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Орозбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы, 2 теленка, 40 овец, а также имеется земельная доля, размером 2,0 ГА на которой она ежегодно сажает ячмень и сено. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Орозбубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят с дальнейшим откормом и реализацией. Доходы от кредита Орозбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на свадьбу младшего сына.
texts.en:
Orozbubu is 49 years old and raising three children together with her husband. Her husband and her youngest son help her with her business. As the main income for her family, Orozbubu works with fattening calves for further reselling, after having started 20 years ago with purchasing cattle for 6,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Orozbubu's persistent work, her farm currently has three cows, two calves, 40 sheep and also a plot of land of 2.0 hectares. There she plants barley and hay every year. The monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Orozbubu turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partner" for a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) for purchasing calves for fattening and reselling. Orozbubu plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock, and plans to save up money for her youngest son's marriage.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж Кием трудовой мигрант. Махбуба более 21 года работает в школе. Она преподает младшим классам. Махбуба является одной из успешных учителей школы. Она имеет большой опыт в сфере педагогики и выполняет свою работу отлично. Махбуба является основной кормилицей своих детей. Ее сын попросил ей купить скутер, но Махбуба не имеет денег. Махбуба запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки скутера. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Mahbuba is a hardworking woman.  She is 40 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband Kiem is a migrant worker.  For more than 21 years, Mahbuba has worked in a school.  She teaches the younger classes.  She is one of the most successful teachers at the school.  She has much experience in the field of education and does her job very well.  She is the main breadwinner for her children.  Her son has asked her to buy him a scooter, but Mahbuba doesn't have the funds to do so.  She is asking for a loan of 2,000 KGS to buy the vehicle.  She awaits your kindness and depends your mercy.

loans.use: To buy a scooter for her son

loans.name: Flor Idalma

texts.es:
Doña Flor tiene un nivel de educación primaria completo cursado hasta el sexto grado, es madre de 1 hija la cual vive con ellos y estudia. En compañía de su conyugue se dedican al cultivo de café siendo el quien le enseñara a trabajar la tierra teniendo mucha experiencia en el cultivo de café apoyándolo desde la plantación hasta el tiempo de corte en todo los aspectos. La tierra que cultivan es propia la cual está ubicada a 10 kilómetros de distancia de su casa de habitación a la cual viaja en motocicleta diariamente. Llegada la hora de corta o recolección del grano se involucran todos los miembros de su familia.

Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento para la compra de 15 QQ de abono, 10 QQ de urea, 10 QQ de 20/20 y 180 latas de café grano los cuales sembrara para una nueva plantación y los otros insumos para que su cultivo este protegido y con la asistencia y mantenimiento necesario.  

Doña Flor para el futuro le gustaría comprar un vehículo para poder trasportar su producto e insumos agrícolas evitando pagar para su traslado ya que de esa forma ella obtendría más ganancias y minimizaría los costos. Como madre ella desea que su hija cumpla su sueño de llegar más allá de donde ella y su esposo pudieron, quiere que se culmine en la universidad estudiando una especialidad que la haga una excelente profesional y una mejor persona.
texts.en:
Doña Flor completed her primary school education through the sixth grade. She is the mother of a daughter who lives with her and goes to school. Flor and her husband devote their time to growing coffee. He was the one who taught her how to work the land and now she has plenty of experience to help him throughout the entire process, from planting to harvesting and all aspects in between. They own the land that they cultivate and it is located 10 kilometers from their house. They must travel by motorcycle every day. When it is time to prune or harvest the coffee beans, they get help from all of their family members.

Flor is requesting a loan so that she can buy 15 quintals of compost (1 quintal = 46 kg), 10 quintals of urea, 10 quintals of 20/20 fertilizer, and 180 cans of coffee seeds for planting a new crop. The other supplies for her crop are already covered, as well as the necessary maintenance.

In the future, Doña Flor plans to buy a vehicle for transporting her products and farming supplies. This will enable her to avoid paying for transportation since she can keep more profit and minimize her costs. As a mother, she wants her daughter to fulfill her dream by going beyond the level that she and her husband were able to accomplish. Flor wants her daughter to finish her university education, pursue a specialty in which she can become a successful professional, and become a better person.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es:
Don José, hombre de 46 años de edad, logró estudiar hasta  séptimo grado,  esta acompañado.  Su compañera de vida se dedica también a la  agricultura, sus tres hijos ya se independizaron. 

Él se dedica específicamente, a la siembra de maíz, maicillo y frijol, estos los cultiva en  la época lluviosa. En la época seca  se dedica a otras actividades,  por ejemplo: la crianza de cerdos, que le genera otros ingresos.
Se dedica a la agricultura  desde que tenía 12 años de edad. Aprendió a trabajar la tierra gracias a que su padrastro le enseño esta actividad. Su milpa se encuentra a 5 km. de su casa, viaja en bicicleta. Su  compañera de vida le ayuda  en los trabajos agrícolas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar  fertilizantes, plaguicidas, herbicidas y semilla para la siembra de 17,500 metros cuadrados de maicillo, debido a que este cultivo esta mejor pagado por el mercado, en comparación al maíz que ha venido a la baja de precios.

Con el préstamo tendrá el capital que le permita el establecimiento y manejo del cultivo. Permitiendole, obtener ingresos que le permitan a él y su señora cubrir las necesidades básicas.

Desea que al cantón puedan llegar instituciones que lleven alternativas  de diversificación de la agricultura, para no estar dependiendo solo de los cultivos mas comunes (maíz, maicillo, ajonjolí y fríjol) y así tener menos riesgo de perder la inversión  hecha.
texts.en:
José, a 46 year old man, has studied up to the seventh grade. He has a partner who is also a farmer and three children who are all adults. 

Specifically, he sows corn, sorghum and beans, which he grows in the rainy season. In the dry season he carries out other activities such as for example: rearing pigs, which gives him other sources of income.

He has been a farmer since he was 12 years old. He learnt to work on the land thanks to his stepfather, who taught him how. His corn field is located 5km away from his house. He travels there by bicycle. His partner helps him with the farming.

The loan he is requesting is to buy fertilizers, insecticides, weed-killer and seed to sow 17,500 square metres of sorghum, because this crop gets a better price in the market, compared to corn whose price has fallen.

With the loan he will have the money to establish and manage his crops. This will allow him to earn income which will cover the basic needs of him and his partner.
