loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings for the next planting.

loans.name: Emelita

texts.en:
Emelita is 53 years old and married with 4 children, two of whom are in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

Emelita runs a general store in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell.  Emelita has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items, such as sugar, rice, canned goods, and other groceries. 

In the future, Emelita would like to save money in order to expand her business and to continue sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Hafizullo

texts.ru: Хафизулло добродушный мужчина в возрасте 32 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Живёт он со своей супругой счастливо, он очень любит её и своих детей. Хафизулло имеет высшее военное образование, работает офицером в военной части. Получает хорошую стабильную заработную плату. Хафизулло очень добрый и ответственный человек. Жена Хафизуло нигде не работает, она постоянно находится дома и заботится о своих детях, у неё много дел по дому, так как они живут в сельской местности. Так как они живут немного далеко от города, у Хафизуло возникает трудность с перемещением. Он уже давно хочет купить собственную машину, но ему так и не удалось по сей день накопить необходимой суммы денег для покупка машины. Зарплата, которую он получает на своей работе, в основном расходуется на пропитание своей семьи, но для удовлетворения своих потребительских нужд и покупки более дорогостоящих товаров ему трудно накопить денег. Тогда Хафизулло решился взять кредит для удовлетворения потребительских нужд. Он обратился в Арванд и желает получить кредит для покупки машины. Наличие собственной машины намного облегчит его передвижение. Хафизулло выражает благодарность  Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Hafizullo is a good natured 32 year old man. He is married and has two children. He and his wife are happy together - he loves her and their children very much. Hafizullo has a military university education, and he works as an officer in a military unit. He earns a good stable income. Hafizullo is a good and responsible man. His wife does not work, as she stays home to care for their children, and always has a lot to do since they live in a rural area. Since they live a bit far from the city, transportation is often difficult for Hafizullo. He has long wanted to buy his own car, but he hasn't yet been able to accumulate enough money. The salary he earns from his work mostly goes toward feeding the family, so it is hard to save money to buy consumer goods and more expensive items. Hafizullo decided to take out a loan for consumer goods. He came to Arvand and is requesting a loan to buy a car. Having his own car will make transportation much easier. Hafizullo is thankful to Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en:
Eulalia is a 51-year-old, married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has seven children. She engages in a food vending business. She sells homemade meals, like fried fish, stewed vegetables, pork adobo (a dish of marinated meat) and other prepared foods.

She requested a loan of 20,000 PHP. She will use it to buy more supplies, including rice, seasonings, meat, vegetables and fish. These purchases will enable her to offer a variety of dishes and could attract more customers. In the future, Eulalia would like to expand her food vending business by purchasing a tricycle, which would be very helpful in her daily livelihood activity.

loans.use: to buy more supplies, like rice, seasonings, meat, vegetables and fish

loans.name: Pablito

texts.en:
Pablito is a farmer from the town of Trinidad, Bohol.  He is a married man and a father of four children.  Pablito has been in the business for more than 10 years now.  This is the source of his income.

Pablito is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.  With this he will be able to improve the productivity of the farm, thus augmenting his yield and income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is married with three children and lives in Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur with her family. She operates a service based business selling foodstuff in their community to earn a living. She has been in this business for more than three years. She just joined Gata Daku MPC recently and borrowed a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her carinderia (mini-restaurant). She plan to expand her business in order to generate more income for the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients

loans.name: Monique Afiavi

texts.fr: Monique Afiavi âgée de 46 ans est mariée à un certain Philippe. Le couple à trois enfants, tous scolarisés. Monique Afiavi vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Monique Afiavi a fréquenté l'école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille Monique Afiavi vend des tissus, des glacières et des bols par la technique de distribution dans sa région depuis quinze ans. Dans le but d’augmenter son fonds de roulement et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Monique Afiavi sollicite pour la cinquième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Monique Afiavi is 46 years old. Her husband’s name is Philippe. They have three children, all in school. Monique Afiavi lives together with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for the household needs. Monique Afiavi stopped attending school at the secondary level. In order to provide for her family needs, she has been selling fabric, coolers and bowls through a regional distribution system for some 15 years. With the goal of bolstering her capital and meeting customer demand, Monique Afiavi is applying for ALIDé’s financial support for the fifth time. Her prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabric, coolers and bowls.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy works hard to support his family. Jimmy is single and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. He has been in this business for 20 years now. 

Jimmy requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell. He would like to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

(NWTF-Project Dungganon not only caters to women but also to men in order to improve their business)

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel is 42 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

For the past ten years Anabel has had a sewing business. She is applying for a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her business.

In the future Anabel would like to build her business and be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 53 years old, married and has four children, three of whom are in school. 

Elena is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy pesticides and fertilizer.

Elena has been farming rice for 19 years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rukiya

texts.ru: Рукия добродушная и позитивная женщина. Она разведена, имеет двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина, ещё с детства она всегда была рядом с мамой и училась от неё всем домашним делам. Также мама научила её хорошо шить. К сожалению, Рукия не смогла получить высшего образования в связи с финансовыми трудностями в семье. Но она хорошо обучилась шитью и сейчас это является её основным бизнесом, который приносит ей хороший доход. Рукия является портнихой и занимается шитьем одежд. У нее много  постоянных клиентов. Этим она зарабатывает на жизнь, кормит свою семью. Рукия мечтает иметь хороший дом, чтобы в нём было приятно и удобно жить. Сейчас дом, в котором они живут находится в нехорошем состоянии, поэтому Рукия хочет отремонтировать этот дом. Она собирается произвести капитальный ремонт в своем доме. Но для этого ей нужна большая сумма денег, а то что она сейчас имеет от своего бизнес хватает только на пропитание. Поэтому Рукия решила получить кредит для ремонта своего дома. Для этого она обратилась в Арванд и желает получить кредит для покупки строительных материалов. Она верит и надеется на положительный результат, а также заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Rukya is a good natured and positive woman. She is divorced and has two children. She is a very hard-working woman. As a child she always stayed near her mother and learned all the household activities from her. Her mother also taught her to sew. Unfortunately Rukya was not able to go to college because of her family's financial hardship. However, she was able to learn sewing well, and now that is her primary business, and earns her a good income. Rukya is a dressmaker and seamstress. She has many regular clients. This work supports her and feeds her family. She dreams of having a good home so that the family could live better and more comfortably. The house where she lives now is not in good condition, so Rukya would like to do some remodeling. She is planing to do major repairs, but she needs a lot of money, and what she has from her business is only enough for food. Because of that, she decided to apply a loan for the repairs. To do that she came to Arvand and is hoping to receive a loan for building materials. She hopes for and believes that she will have good results, and she thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Mahoutin Léontine

texts.fr: Mahoutin Léontine âgée de 40 ans est veuve. Mahoutin Léontine à trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Mahoutin Léontine vit ensemble avec ses enfants. Les diverses charges du ménage sont assurées par elle. Mahoutin Léontine n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille Mahoutin Léontine vend de la pâte de maïs accompagnée de sauce dans sa région depuis dix huit ans. Dans le but d’augmenter son fonds de roulement et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Mahoutin Léontine sollicite pour la septième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Mahoutin Léontine, 40-years-old, is a widow. Mahoutin Léontine has three children, of which some are in school and all are in her care. Mahoutin Léontine lives together with her children. She takes care of the various household responsibilities. Mahoutin Léontine did not go to school. To meet the needs of her family, Mahoutin Léontine has sold corn pasta with sauce in her region for eighteen years. In the hope of increasing her working capital and satisfying the demands of her customer base, Mahoutin Léontine is asking for the financial support of ALIDé for the seventh time. The previous loans were repaid in full.

loans.use: to purchase corn, spices, and fish.

loans.name: Delinda

texts.en:
Delinda, 32, is married to Ibnu, 37, with no children yet. Her husband is an entrepreneur. Delinda and her husband live in a rented room near her husband's work.

Delinda was a teacher, but since the school was far from her residence, she started her own business instead. In 2010, she decided to use her knowledge of baking and cooking to support her family by running a catering business. She also receives orders for snacks such as cookies, chips, cheese sticks, etc., from her customers, and for selling at stalls in the neighborhood. 

Delinda sees that the business has good opportunity to grow bigger in the future that is why she plans to expand the business, unfortunately she has limited capital and of course she needs more capital to go through. This situation led her to propose a loan from TLM of amounting IDR 4.500.000. This loan would enable her to purchase rice, cooking ingredients, vegetables, cooking oil, kerosene and also to help her start a business of selling mobile phone credit (known as 'pulsa'). She hopes that the business will run well so it will enable her to improve her income as well as to repay the loan to TLM on time.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking ingredients, vegetables, cooking oil, kerosene and also start a business of selling mobile phone credit

loans.name: Jeneveb

texts.en:
Jeneveb is 33 years old and has a child. For the past eight years she has sold dried fish in the market at Tukuran in Zamboanga del Sur to make a living. She earns approximately 15,000 PHP a month.

Jeneveb joined Gata Daku MPC recently and applied for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy an additional variety of dried fish to sell. She is thankful to GDMPC for offering these loans that help her to improve her quality of life.

Jeneveb’s ambition is to improve living conditions for herself and her child.

loans.use: to buy an additional variety of dried fish

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Florentina

texts.en:
Florentina is married, and she works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from fish vending.

Florentina is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy more groceries to sell at her general store. Florentina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream:  to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell at her store

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Monina works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income by raising pigs and by owning a cafeteria.

Monina is borrowing PHP 19,500 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more groceries to sell at her general store.

Monina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream:  to save money, to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell at her store

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Maria es originaria de la ciudad Granada. Tiene 53 años de edad, casada y madre de 8 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa  hace 1 año. Empezó con esta actividad junto a sus hijos quienes distribuyen sus productos de manera ambulante, tiene el apoyo de su esposo que es zapatero y ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Solicita el crédito  para comprar productos como: crema, blusas, perfumes, maquillaje y pantalones con el fin de comprar al por mayor y  abastecer a todos sus clientes.  Su plan futuro es vender otros tipos de productos, comercializarlos en un local estable y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria is from the city of Granada. She is 53 years old, married and the mother of 8 children. She is a merchant who has sold cosmetics and clothing for one year. She started this activity with her children who distribute the products as street vendors. She has her husband's support. He is a cobbler and helps with the household expenses. She is asking for the loan to buy products such as cream, blouses, perfumes, makeup and pants wholesale and supply her customers. Her future plan is to sell other types of products from a stable locale and obtain more income.

loans.use: to buy: cream, blouses, perfume, makeup and pants.

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah is a 54-year-old married woman. She has five children ranging in age from fifteen to 25 years. She describes herself as optimistic and positive.

Dinah sells cereals to earn an income. She is applying for a 15,600 KES loan through SMEP DTM to buy a water tank to store clean water in for the family’s use.

Dinah’s ambition is to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy a water tank for her home

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati is a married woman who has five children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are fees and food for the family.

For the past nine years, she has operated a retail food sales business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbors, pupils and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase stock to resell, including wheat flour, maize flour, beans and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase foods to resell, including wheat flour, maize flour, beans and cooking oil

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: El Sr. Freddy  tiene 51 años tiene un hijo de la edad de 10 años, se dedica al servicio de internet y juegos en red en su café internet que tiene en la populosa zona de Plan 3000 de la ciudad de Santa Cruz,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el es cliente nuevo, el Sr. Freddy    va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un stand metálica para su negocio ya que este le permitirá mostrar los productos magnéticos que también ofrece a la venta,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para la compra de este material, el Sr. Freddy    enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que por la zona existen varios café internet, pero el no se puede quejar ya que tiene clientela y utilizara los beneficios en la compra de mas equipos de computación para equipar mas su negocio, el  Sr. Freddy  es una persona muy trabajadora esta es la única actividad con la que se mantiene,  se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Freddy is 51. He has a 10 year old son. He works offering an internet service and web games in his internet cafe that he has in the populated area of Plan 3000 in the city of Santa Cruz. This loan is her first cycle in the institution, as he is a new client. Freddy is going to use this loan to buy a metallic stand for his business that will allow him to display his magnetic products that he also sells. His reason for asking for this loan is that he doesn't have enough money to buy the materials. Freddy faces challenges in his business, such as competition, since there are several internet cafes in the area. He can't complain, though, because he has customers and he will use the profits to buy more computers for his business. Freddy is a very hardworking person. This is the only activity he has. He is happy and grateful for the opportunity being offered.

loans.use: to buy a metallic stand.

loans.name: Melchie

texts.en:
Melchie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF to buy fishing netting and other equipment for her fishing business.

Melchie successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is presenting Melchie's business profile again for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing netting and other equipment.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as determined. She operates a retail store, where she sells basins, plastic trays, cosmetics, and other goods. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a water tank in which to store clean water. Her family faces a lack of enough water storage capacity. They will be able to store enough clean water, with the tank she will buy with the loan funds. She hopes that in the future, she will grow economically. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica, de 23 años, está casada y tiene 02 hijos de 07 y 02 años de edad respectivamente, vive al lado de ellos en la casa de sus suegros. Jessica se dedica a la venta de comida. Su trabajo se inicia desde muy temprano, ya que todos los días se dirige al mercado a comprar los ingredientes necesarios para preparar los más ricos platos para sus clientes. Prepara todas las comidas durante el transcurso del día porque su horario de atención empieza a partir de las 5 de la tarde hasta que termine todo lo que ofrece a la venta, vende en la vereda de la casa de sus suegros. Trabaja sola y lleva realizando esta actividad desde hace 3 años. Le gusta su trabajo por que puede dedicarle el tiempo y la atención necesaria a sus hijos quienes aun son pequeños y necesitan de su cuidado, durante el tiempo que tiene trabajando en éste negocio, aprendió a brindarle siempre una sonrisa al cliente y darle una buena atención, pues eso hace que vuelvan a su puesto y de esta forma conserva su clientela. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará una mesa y 4 sillas y tambien comprará ingredientes como pollos, carnes, papas, aceites y embutidos para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: Jessica is 23 years old. She is married and has 2 children, aged 7 and 2. She lives with them in her in-law's house. Jessica sells food. She starts her work very early, since every day she goes to the market to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare the most delicious dishes for her customers. She prepares the dishes during the day because her service hours start at 5 in the afternoon until she finishes selling everything she has to sell. She sells on the sidewalk in front of her in-laws' house. She works alone and has been doing this activity for 3 years. She likes her work because she can spend the time she needs to with her children who are still small and need her care. During the time she has been working at this business she has learned to always offer a smile to the customer and give good service. This makes them come back to her spot and this way she keeps her customers. At this time, she will ask for S/. 800 soles. She is grateful for the support she has received to get ahead and she is committed to making her payments on time. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy a table and 4 chairs as well as ingredients such as chicken, beef, potatoes, oil and cold cuts to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as chicken, beef, potatoes, oil, and cold cuts.

loans.name: Ramla

texts.en:
Ramla is a single woman who has four children, all of them in school. She lives in a rented house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Ramla prepares different kinds of food and sells them to her customers. The foods she makes include dumplings, tea, rice and beans. Her customers are her neighbors and passersby.

She is requesting a loan of KES 50,000. She will use it to purchase cooking oil, sugar, salt, wheat flour, and tea leaves, for her business. She joined Yehu for financial support.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, sugar, salt, wheat flour, and tea leaves, for her prepared food sales business

loans.name: Mujibakhon

texts.ru: Мучибахон жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 45 лет. Она разведена со своим мужем и имеет одного сына. Её сын в данное время находится на заработках в России, там он работает на стройке и получает доход, который каждый месяц присылает своей матери. Мучибахон старается растить своего сына достойным человеком, и хочет чтобы он ни в чём не нуждался. Поэтому она сама также работает и зарабатывает деньги.  Она работает в дехканском хозяйстве и получает за это небольшой доход. Мучибахон давно мечтала иметь хорошо благоустроенный дом, где будет жить вместе с ней её сын со своей женой. Сейчас её дом нуждается в капитальном ремонте. И Мучибахон хочет сделать хороший ремонт в своём доме. Но для этого ей необходима большая сумма денежных средств. Доходы, которые она и ее сын получают, не могут покрыть всех расходов, либо потребуется долгое время, чтобы накопить всю необходимую сумму. Поэтому, чтобы своевременно произвести ремонт в своем доме, она решила получить кредит для покупки всех необходимых строительных материалов сразу и скорее начать работу по ремонту дома. Она обратилась в Арванд для получения кредита и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Mujibakhon is a joyful and hard-working 45 year old woman. She is divorced from her husband and has one son. Her son is currently in Russia, where he works at a construction site and receives a good income which he sends each month to his mother. Mujibakhon is trying to raise her son to be a 
worthy man and does not want him to lack anything he needs. Because of this she herself works to earn money. She works on a farm, which earns her a small income. She has been dreaming for a long time of having a comfortable house where she can live with her son and his wife. Her house needs major repairs, and Mujibakhon would like to do a good remodeling, but she will need a lot of money to do it. The income that she and her son earn cannot cover all expenses and it would take a long time to save the needed sum. Because of this, in order to do a remodeling of her house she decided to request a loan to buy the needed building materials right away and quickly begin work. She turned to Arvand for the loan and is hoping for a good result.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Damaris

texts.en:
Damaris is a 46-year-old married woman with three children ranging in age from two and half to fourteen years. She describes herself as enthusiastic and enterprising.

Damaris has a stall in the market where she sells tomatoes, bananas, carrots and other produce. She is applying for a 20,000 KES loan through SMEP DTM, her first from this institution. She wants to buy a tank to store water in for her family, as it is challenged by the lack of clean water for use.

Damaris’ goal is to see her business expand within five years.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Barthelemy

texts.fr:
Barthelemy est un béninois de 39 ans  marié avec Ida, une couturière. Ensemble ils ont eu 3 enfants, dont certains sont en âge d'être scolarisés, et ont 1 enfant qui leur a été confié. 

Depuis 25 ans, Barthelemy exerce avec un passion le métier électromécanicien dans son atelier et est réputé dans son quartier pour son bon travail. 
Il demande aujourd'hui son 5ème prêt, les autres ayant été remboursés dans leur intégralité sans aucun soucis, afin de renforcer et développer son activité. Régulièrement il se rend au Nigeria pour acheter des pièces électroniques afin de réparer les équipements électroniques que ses clients lui apportent. 

Dorénavant, il souhaite aussi acheter des DVDs et des postes de télévision pour pouvoir les revendre. 

Il épargnera les bénéfices dans l'espoir de pouvoir bientôt acheter sa propre parcelle
texts.en: Barthelemy is 39-year-old man from Benin, married to Ida, a seamstress. Together, they have three children, some of whom are school-age, and also have one child who was entrusted to them. For 25 years, Barthelemy has worked with passion in the field of electro-mechanics in his workshop, and is renowned in his neighborhood for his good work. He asks today for his fifth loan, having completely paid back the others with no concerns, in order to strengthen and develop his business. He regularly visits Nigeria to buy electronic parts in order to repair the electronic equipment that his customers bring to him. From now on, he wishes to also buy DVDs and TV sets so that he can resell them. He will save the profits in the hopes of soon being able to buy his own piece of land.

loans.use: to purchase electronic parts to strengthen his stock

loans.name: Sofia Paola

texts.es: La Sra. Sofia tiene 19 años, ella se dedica a la venta de pollo al espiedo en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona 9 de abril,   este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Sofia va a usar este préstamo para compra de mesas y silla para su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo la falta de efectivo para la compra de esta herramienta útil para su negocio,  La Sra. Sofia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las condiciones climáticas y también la competencia  de los demás negocios de comida rápida por lo mismo que tiene que tratar de reducir sus costos y mejorar su sazón   de sus platillos, y va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de utensilios  y también en la ampliación de la misma para poder captar más clientes, La Sra. Sofia es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por esta oportunidad brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Sofia is 19 years old. She sells rotisserie chicken in her sales spot located in the 9 de abril area. This loan is her first cycle in the institution. Sofia is going to use this loan to buy tables and chairs for her business. Her reason for asking for this loan is a lack of cash to buy these tools that are useful for his business. Sofia faces challenges in her business, such as weather conditions as well as the competition from other fast food businesses, so she has to try to reduce costs and improve the taste of her dishes. She is going to use the profits to buy utensils and also expand to serve more customers. Sofia is a very hardworking person. She is happy with this opportunity that has been offered with the loan.

loans.use: to invest in tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Ife Group

texts.fr: Le groupe IFE est composé de trois personnes, qui sont des amies. M. Odounyêmi(celle qui a la main levée sur la photo), est la représente de ce groupe. M. Odounyêmi âgée de 29 ans a fréquenté l'école jusqu'au niveau secondaire. M. Odounyêmi est mariée à certain Djamil Deen. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés et aucun à leur charge. M. Odounyêmi vit avec son mari et ses enfants. les charges du ménages sont supportées par le couple. Pour cela M. Odounyêmi vend du charbon et du maïs dans sa région depuis quatre ans. M. Odounyêmi s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, M. Odounyêmi s’associe avec les autres membres du groupe IFE pour solliciter un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieur ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The IFE group is composed of three friends. M. Odounyêmi (the one raising her hand in the photo) is the group’s representative. She is 29 years old. She stopped attending school at the secondary level. Her husband’s name is Djamil Deen. They have three children, some of whom are in school, and no [other] dependants. M. Odounyêmi lives together with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for household needs. In order to do so, M. Odounyêmi has been selling charcoal and coal in her region for four years. She stocks up at a market in Benin. With the goal of strengthening her business, M. Odounyêmi, together with the other members of the IFE group, is seeking a fourth loan from ALIDé. Their prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and corn.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is married with four children. She is 47 years old and lives in Mitugas, Tudela, Philippines.

Angelita sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for eight years. Each month, she earns PHP 7,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 14,900 to purchase additional products, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergent, soap, etc.

Angelita has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, she hopes to save for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergent, soap, etc.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as focused. She operates a beauty salon, where she does hair treatments, plaiting, and other services.

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a water tank in which to store clean water. Her family faces a challenge of a lack of enough water storage capacity. The water tank will enable them to store enough water. She hopes that in the future, she will grow economically and sustain herself. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank in which to store clean water, for her family's use

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a retail stall, where she sells cassava.

She will use the KES 5,800 loan to buy a solar lamp, for lighting her house. The family faces a challenge of costly fuel; hence, the need for solar energy. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to purchase a larger solar panel. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: María Sebastiana

texts.es:
María, tiene 51 años, vive junto a su hijo de 13 años,  que estudia sexto grado, tiene un hijo de 26 años que reside en Estados Unidos, es importante mencionar que ella estuvo casada por 8 meses y que al separarse con el esposo quedó embarazada y que ese niño se le murió al nacer. Los hijos que ella posee son adoptados.

Ella se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal,  que se encuentra a 3 kilómetros de su vivienda. Esta actividad la desempeña, desde que tiene 19 años de edad; además, es líder en su comunidad y es la presidenta de la asociación de desarrollo comunal, lo que le sirvió para adquirir el trabajo de coordinadora de un programa denominado PATI que se está ejecutando desde el 2011 impulsado por la alcaldía de la ciudad y supervisado por el FISDL; consiste en enseñar a jóvenes y adultos mayores en la elaboración de huertos caseros, elaboración de pan, pizzas. En este proyecto le incentivan con $200.00 por mes. Considerando que trabaja con los grupos de lunes a viernes, en los horarios de 8:00 a 12:00 pm.


El préstamo será invertido así: $500.00 para hacer reparaciones al techo de la vivienda y $545.00 en forestar con árboles frutales una parcela que se encuentra a Oria de la calle panamericana, en la que aspira instalar su restaurante en un futuro  y $155.00 para cancelar el préstamo vigente en la Fundación Campo.

Con la inversión, gozara de confort y salud al  evitar humedad en el interior de su casa y apoyarle en la construcción y realización del sueño de instalar un restaurante fuera de la ciudad en una zona de afluencia de personas.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and lives with her son who is 13 and is a student in grade six. She also has a 26 year old son who lives in the United States. It is important to mention that she was married for 8 months and on separating from her husband she was pregnant. This child died at birth. The children she has are adopted. 

María sells fruit and vegetables in the municipal market which is 3 kilometers from her house. She has done this since she was 19 years old. Moreover she is a leader in her community. She is the president of the Community Development Society which helped her get a job as the Co-coordinator of a program, called PATI. It was instigated by the major's office and is supervised by FISDL (a federal social initiative institution). She has occupied this position this since 2011. She teaches seniors and children about home vegetable gardens and making bread and pizzas. She receives $200 per month from the project, for working with the groups from 8 until 12 pm, Monday to Friday.

Maria will use $500  of this loan to repair the roof of her house, $545 in planting fruit trees on a plot of land beside the Pan American Highway, where she plans one day to open a restaurant and $155 to pay off an existing loan she has with Fundación Campo. With this loan she can enjoy health and comfort with no dampness inside her home and help her in the construction and realization of her dream of opening a restaurant outside the city in an area with an abundance of people.

loans.use: to make repairs to the roof of her house and $545.00 to plant fruit trees on a plot of land  beside the Pan American Highway.

loans.name: Faapalagi

texts.en:
Faapalagi is 55 years old and widowed with nine children. She owns and operates a business venture: elei, Samoan designed outfits. She has many years of experience in this line of business. 

Faapalagi needs a loan to buy materials, fabric paints, stencils and brushes. She hopes to use her profits to support her family. She joined SPBD in 2008.

loans.use: to buy materials, fabric paints, stencils and brushes.

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha appreciates having received the previous loan, which generated profits that improved her living standard.

Now, she is requesting a new loan of KES 50,000. She will use this amount to purchase beans, cooking oil, wheat flour, and vegetables for her food stall. She thanks Yehu and Kiva for their financial policy.

loans.use: to purchase beans, cooking oil, wheat flour, and vegetables for her food stall

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase his capital and purchase many boards to resell and increase his profit.

loans.name: Pirenam

texts.fr: Madame Pirenam vit avec son conjoint et son enfant de 05ans à Lomé. Il a appris comme métier la coiffure et a ouvert son atelier à la fin de sa formation. Elle coiffe ses clients et revend au même moment des pagnes et des mèches. Elle désire satisfaire ses derniers c'est pour cela madame Pirenam demande un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des mèches et pagnes. Elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique et contribuer au besoin de la famille. Elle est âgée de 27ans avec une ancienneté de 05ans dans l'activité.
texts.en:
Pirenam lives with her partner and her 5-year-old child in Lomé. She learned hairstyling as a profession and opened her own shop at the end of her training. Pirenam does hair styling and at the same time resells hair extensions and "pagnes" or traditional cloth wraps. 

She hopes to further these activities and so Pirename is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase the traditional cloth and hair extensions. She hopes to open a shop and contribute to the needs of her family. Pirename is 27 years old and has 5 years of experience in this business.

loans.use: purchase hair extensions and pagnes (traditional cloth)

loans.name: Vaiolupe

texts.en:
Vaiolupe is 24 years old and married with five children. She owns and operates a business venture: elei, Samoan designed outfits. She has many years of experience in this line of business. 

Vaiolupe needs a loan to buy fabric paints, materials, wooden board designs, brushes and stencils. She hopes to use her profits to support her family. She joined SPBD in 2008.

loans.use: to buy fabric paints, materials, wooden board designs, brushes and stencils.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 53 years old and lives in Catarman, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children. 

Myrna has a hog raising business and earns approximately PHP 7,000 every three months doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to pay for feed. 

Myrna has been a member of PMPC for 14 years. In the future, she hopes her children become professionals someday.

loans.use: to pay for feed.

loans.name: Toktokan

texts.ru: Токтокан 52 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Токтокан среднее образование, работает в местной больнице, в качестве санитарки, супруг работает в этой же больнице, в качестве садовода. Старший сын- женат, находится на заработках в Москве, помогает родителям материально, высылая им ежемесячно зарплату в Кыргызстан, остальные дети студенты. Токтокан в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Токтокан и ее дружной семьи, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 лошадь, а также 15 голов мелкого рогатого скота, ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Токтокан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки 1 головы крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Токтокан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на проведение свадьбы для сына.
texts.en:
Toktokan is 52 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising four children.  She has a secondary education and works as an orderly at the local hospital.  Her husband is employed by the same hospital and works as a gardener.  Toktokan's oldest son is married and making a living in Moscow.  He helps his parents financially, sending them money every month in Kyrgyzstan.  The couple's other children are still in school.

(In addition to her hospital job), Toktokan is also involved in animal husbandry, which provides her family with an additional source of income.  She started in this business 20 years ago using an initial capital of 10,000 som (KGS)  to buy livestock.  Thanks to her hard work and to the support of her close-knit family, Toktokan now owns one horse as well as 15 head of small livestock, and she makes a monthly income of 3,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her animal husbandry business, she has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to increase her herd by purchasing one head of cattle.  She plans to invest her earnings from this loan into further increasing her livestock headcount.  She is also planning to save enough money for her son's wedding ceremony.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter plus de céréales pour revendre, madame Essi mariée à un maitre maçon et maman d'un enfant de 05ans scolarisé demande un premier prêt à WAGES. Elle revend ses marchandises à domicile et désire avec le profit subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Elle est âgée de 38ans avec une ancienneté de 03ans dans l'activité.
texts.en:
Essi is married to a mason and is the mother of a 5-year-old child who is in school. She is seeking her first loan with WAGES in order to purchase more grain for resale.

Essie resells her merchandise out of her home and hopes to use the profit to provide for the needs of her family. She is 38 years old and has 3 years of experience in this business.

loans.use: purchase grain

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is married with two children. She is 54 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban, Philippines.

Nilda sells SmartLoad (prepaid mobile phone credits) to earn a living and has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 6,000 to purchase additional SmartLoad.

Nilda has been a member of PMPC for two years. She hopes to save as a reserve for the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional SmartLoad (prepaid mobile phone credits).

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
Martha tiene 26 vive con los papás, su hija de 11 meses de edad y un hermano que tiene 25 años, que trabaja como ayudante de albañil. 


Ella Trabaja en el área de atención al cliente en una funeraria, este es su primer trabajo, el que pudo obtener, después de graduarse como bachiller.

El préstamo servirá para: $800.0 pagar una deuda que se genero por problemas de salud, esta es con un usurero y $200.00 que invertirá en mejoras al techo de  su vivienda.  Con lo que estaría, evitando  seguir desgastándose económicamente al pagar intereses altos con el usurero y  evitar que las aguas lluvias  humedezcan el interior de la vivienda y no dañe sus pertenencias.


Logrando una situación de confort y salud al evitar humedad en el interior de la vivienda, no se reproducen insectos y microorganismos nocivos a la salud. Su sueño es adquirir una vivienda.
texts.en:
Martha, 26, lives with her parents, her 11-month-old daughter, and her brother, 25, who works as a bricklayer assistant.  She works in the field of customer service in a funeral home.  This is the first job she could find after she graduated with her degree.

Martha will use the loan to repay an $800 debt with a money lender because of a health problem and to invest $200 in improvements to the roof of her house.

This would help her avoid spending all her money paying high interest rates to the money lender and to prevent the rain from dampening the interior of her home and damaging her belongings.  She would be comfortable and healthy without the humidity inside her house, and there wouldn't be insects and microorganisms that are hazardous to her health.

Her dream is to get a house.

loans.use: to repay a debt and to make improvements on the roof of her house

loans.name: Anisia

texts.en: Anisia is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself to be focused and determined. She operates a grocery store where she sells onions, bananas, carrots, charcoal and other vegetables, etc. She will use the 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy a water tank to store clean water. Her family faces a lack of enough water storage facilities. They will be able to store enough clean water. She hopes that in the future, she will grow economically. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank to store clean water for her family.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen runs a butcher shop in one of Nairobi's estates. He is 27 years old, married and has one child, aged 3 years. He has been in this business for one and a half years and currently makes a monthly income of 22,000 Kenya Shillings. 

This is his second loan term, and he will use the loan to expand his business by building a sitting shed just outside the butcher shop, in which his customers can eat boiled, fried or roasted meat. He also intends to buy chairs and tables, and more stock of meat to sell. 

Stephen will use the expected profits from the expanded business to repay his loan, as well as add to his investments and open a salon for his wife. 

He hopes to become a successful businessman and a responsible parent by providing for his family's basic needs.

loans.use: to build a sitting shed in which his customers can eat boiled, fried or roasted meat; also to buy chairs and tables, and more stock of meat to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Banawe

texts.fr: Banawe âgée de 37ans revend des boissons. Elle est mariée à un banquier avec 02 enfants en charge tous scolarisés. Ces derniers sont âgés de 07 et 05ans. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients, elle sollicite son premier prêt à WAGES pour renforcer son activité. Le profit l'aidera à créer d'autres activités et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
37-year-old Banawe resells beverages. She is married to a banker and has two children to care for, both of whom attend school. They are seven and five years old.

To better meet the needs of her customers, she is requesting her first loan from WAGES to bolster her business. The profits will help her create additional activities and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: buy beverages

loans.name: Sophy's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Sampov Meas district of Pursat Province, Sophy is 32 years old and blessed with three dependent children, one schoolchild and two little children. Sophy endures her family hardship via four hectares of rice-cropping, while her husband catches fish for resale and works for others for a fee for additional income. Engaged in her current business for ten years, Sophy is able to earn about 24,000 KHR per day.  

Sophy is a fifth-time borrower and her fellow group member is a first-cycle client with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Her past loan has enabled her to maintain her business with good progress. In this new cycle, she and her co-borrower are seeking 2,000,000 KHR each. 

As the leader, Sophy will spend her loan portion to buy ten sacks of fertilizer and to pay for the transplanting fee. She hopes that she can replant her rice on time, with a good income in return, so she can build a new house and a decent latrine for her family.

loans.use: to buy ten sacks of fertilizer and to pay for the transplanting fee.

loans.name: Kimsan

texts.ru: Кимсан 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Кимсан - высшее образование, работает в местной школе-преподавателем. Супруг работает-трактористом, старший сын торгует сотовыми телефонами, остальные дети студенты. Кимсан в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 16,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кимсан и ее семьи, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 головы крупного рогатого скота, а также 20 голов мелкого рогатого скота, ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кимсан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Кимсан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Kimsan is 47 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising three children.  She has a higher education and works as a teacher at the local school.  Kimsan's husband works as a tractor driver.  Her oldest son sells cell-phones.  Her other two children are still in school.

(In addition to her teacher's job), Kimsan is also involved in animal husbandry, which provides her family with an additional source of income.  She started in this business 15 years ago, using 16,000 som (KGS) to buy some livestock.  Thanks to her hard work and to the support of her family, she now owns two cows and 20 head of smaller livestock, and she makes a monthly income of 6,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her animal husbandry business, she has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to increase her herd by purchasing some cows.  She plans to invest her earnings from this loan into further increasing her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Koleta

texts.en:
Koleta is 61 years old and widowed with six children. 

She has a small garden where she grows different kinds of flowers that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for four years. Koleta needs a loan to buy flower pots, fertilizer, a garden fork, garden hose and rake. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2004. Koleta will use the profits from her sales to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy flower pots, fertilizer, a garden fork, garden hose and rake.

loans.name: María Roselia

texts.es: Doña Maria de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, refrescos y licuados desde hace 8 años,  es una persona muy amable, respetuosa, servicial, honesta y luchadora, posee una gran cantidad de clientes que compran  sus productos, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia , en la zona hay poca competencia lo que le permite tener más demanda, gracias a  su trabajo y la ayuda de su hijo ha logrado solventar algunos de sus gastos familiares, ella solicita un crédito  para la compra de gaseosas y refrescos todo mayor para surtir su negocio, y así obtener mayores ingresos y satisfacer la demanda que posee, y poder lograr una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, 52, lives in her own house with her son.  She has made a living selling soda, soft drinks, and smoothies for eight years.  She's a very friendly, respectful, obliging, honest, and persevering person.  She has a lot of customers who buy her products.  Her business is located in her house.

There's little competition in the area, which allows her to have more demand.  Thanks to her job and to the help of her son she has managed to cover some of the family expenses.

She's requesting a loan to buy soda and soft drinks wholesale to stock her business.  This way she'll earn more income, satisfy her demand, and be able to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soda and soft drinks

loans.name: Indolesia

texts.en:
Indolesia is a 70-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various items, such as sugar, cooking oil, eggs, canned goods, coffee, soap and toiletries. Aside from running a store, she goes fishing and sells the fish. 

Indolesia requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy more stock for the store, and fishing materials like fishing net and materials for a new pump boat, for the improvement of her catch. 

In the future, Indolesia would like to improve both of her businesses to provide a proper diet and good living conditions in preparation for old age.

loans.use: to buy more stock for the store and fishing materials like fishing net.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a  Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be focused and industrious. He sells socks, wallets, torches, etc., on the streets. He will use the 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan to buy a water tank to store clean water. His family faces lack of enough water-storage facilities. They will be able to store enough clean water for domestic use. He hopes that in the future, he will grow economically. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank to store clean water.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Kokou homme de 40ans vit avec sa famille(femme et 04 enfants) à Lomé. Il est électricien auto et en même temps revendeur de batteries. Aidé par 02 personnes, il sollicite son troisième prêt à WAGES pour acheter des batteries. Il espère épargner et subvenir aux besoins de la famille grâce aux profits.
texts.en: Kokou is 40 years old and he lives with his family (his wife and four children) in Lomé.  He works as an auto-electrician and also resells batteries.  Two persons help him run his business.  He is requesting a third loan from WAGES to buy some car batteries.  He hopes that the profits from this loan will help him to save some money and meet his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy car batteries for resale.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.es:
Juanita, de 27 años de edad, está casada con Juan con quien tiene tres hijos de 06, 04 y 09 meses de edad, con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Juanita consiste principalmente en la venta de diversas golosinas. Tiene un puesto instalado en la vereda de su casa que está ubicada al costado de un puente muy transitado por las personas y que le dan una gran oportunidad de ventas. Considera que tiene un negocio muy rentable por la fluidez de la clientela que tiene desde niños que van y vienen de una escuela cercana hasta sus propios vecinos que siempre se acercan a comprar algún antojo. Eventualmente vende también gaseosas y diversas frutas durante la semana. Lleva con la misma rutina de trabajo cerca de 10 años y desde que empezó a ejecutarlo lo ha hecho siempre sola. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que siempre le ha fascinado estar en contacto con los clientes, afirma que ha sido muy complicado para ella poder establecer su pequeño negocio ya que anteriormente vendía prendas de vestir pero no le pagaban a tiempo y eso le daba cierto temor de emprender otro negocio, a pesar de ello nunca se rindió y hoy tiene muchos planes con su actual negocio. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800, por tanto agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado comprará galletas, caramelos, chocolates, chicles, chizitos, chupetes y otras golosinas para que continúe trabajando.
texts.en:
Juanita is 27 years old. She is married to Juan, with whom she has three children, ages 6 and 4 years old, and 9 months. They live in their own house. Juanita’s work consists mainly of selling a variety of sweets. She has a stand on the road in front of her house, which is located near a bridge with a lot of traffic and she has a lot of opportunity for sales. She feels her business does very well because of all the people that pass by, from children who come and go from a nearby school, and her own neighbors, who always come by to buy something they want. She also sells soft drinks and a variety of fruits during the week. 

She has been doing this same work for about 10 years and she has always worked by herself. She very much likes what she does because she has always liked to interact with customers. She explains that it has been complicated for her to establish her small business because she used to sell clothing, but people didn’t pay her on time, so that made her afraid to start another business. In spite of this, she never gave up and now she has a lot of plans for her current business. 

She is requesting 800.00 PEN (Peruvian nuevos soles). She is grateful to all the people who make her loan possible so that she can continue with her goals. She pledges to make her repayments in a punctual manner. She will use the loan to buy cookies, caramels, chocolates, chewing gum, puffed cheese snacks, lollipops, and other sweets so she can continue working.

loans.use: to buy cookies, caramels, chocolates, chewing gum, etc.

loans.name: Flor De Cardamomo Campamac Group

texts.es:
El señor Domingo es casado, tiene 46 años de edad, no le dieron la oportunidad de estudiar ya que tenia que ayudar a sus padres con el trabajo, tiene 5 hijos y 4 de ellos estan estudiando, se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la siembra de cardamomo, inició este negocio desde niño ayudando a sus padres y hasta la fecha lleva 35 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la limpieza de cardamomo, desea en el futuro proximo tener mas terreno para sembrar cardamomo. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la siembra de cardamomo y mania. En la fotografia aparecen 19 integrantes pero, solamente a 18 de ellos se le concedio el préstamo.
texts.en:
Domingo is married and is 46 years old.  He was not given the opportunity to go to school, because he had to help his parents with their work.  He has 5 children, 4 of whom attend school.  He is a farmer who grows cardamom.  He started in this line of work when he was a child helping his parents, and so he now has 35 years of experience.

He is organizing a group and requesting a loan that he will use to clear his cardamom fields.  In the future, he wants to have more land to grow cardamom.  The other members of this group grow cardamom and peanuts.  In the photograph 19 members appear, but only 18 of them will be taking this loan.

loans.use: to clear his cardamom fields

loans.name: Paz

texts.es: Doña Paz de 66 años de edad es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora, vive en casa propia con su sobrino de 20 años de edad el estudia actualmente, hace varios años posee su propia tienda, con las ganancias de su negocio logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Paz solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos para su tienda como: granos básicos, azúcar, sopas, refrescos, golosinas, etc. con esto espera brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Paz is 66 years old. She is an enterprising and hardworking person. She lives in her own house with her 20-year-old nephew, who is currently in school. 

For some years, she has had her own store. With the earnings from her business she has been able to pay off some household debts. 

Paz is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for her store, such as: basic grains, sugar, soup, soft drinks, candy, etc. With this loan, she hopes to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, sugar, soup, soft drinks, candy, etc.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 40 years old and widowed. She is blessed with five children and runs a small hotel (primitive restaurant) business in Nairobi. She has been in this business for two and a half years and makes a monthly income of 7,000 Kenya Shillings. 

She plans to use the loan to buy more stock of foodstuffs such as rice, maize flour, sugar and cooking fat. She also plans to buy utensils for use in the hotel. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children, repay her loan and expand her business. 

This is her first loan with KADET LTD., and she hopes to stabilize her business and improve her standards of living by building her own residential home.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, rice, sugar and utensils for use in the hotel.

loans.name: Lipena

texts.en:
Lipena is 48 years old and married, with three children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Lepena has requested a loan to buy a gas oven, gas, a frying pan, dripping oil, sugar and flour. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. 

Lipena will use her earnings to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and equipment

loans.name: Lagi

texts.en: Lagi is 73 years old, widowed, with eight children. She plans to start a business selling tinned food snacks, soap, and much more. She has requested a loan to buy chicken, corned beef, telephone cards, sugar, salt, noodles, milk and laundry soap. Lagi will use her profits to extend her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2007

loans.use: to buy chicken, corned beef, telephone cards, sugar, salt, noodles, milk and laundry soap

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: Doña concepción de 61 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable y dedicada a su trabajo, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, hace 5 años se dedica a la agricultura y adicional a eso vende  frutas y verduras  de forma ambulantes, con las ganancias que obtiene del negocio logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña concepción solicita un crédito para compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plaga, etc.  con esto espera  brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Concepción is 61 years old. She is a very responsible person who is dedicated to her work. She lives in her own house with her life partner and her two children. She has been working in agriculture for the past 5 years. In addition to this, she sells fruits and vegetables as a street vendor. With the income from her business, she is able to pay for some of the expenses of her household. Concepción is requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs such as manure, fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, etc. With this she hopes to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 37 years old and a single mother of one child. She supports three family members. She has a grocery shop and has been in this business for 10 years. She currently gets a monthly income of 8,500 Kenya Shillings. 

She will use the loan to purchase more vegetables and cereals for her shop. This will enable her to have enough stock to meet the demands of her customers. She will use the generated profits to pay for her son’s school fees and feed her family. 

This is her first loan with KADET LTD., and her dream is to have a happy family.

loans.use: To add stock of vegetables and cereals.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 25 years old and married but has no children. Her husband provides additional income, which she uses to support her two siblings. She runs a mobile money transfer business (M-pesa) shop, which gives her a monthly income of 6,000 Kenya Shillings. She also has a photocopying business.

Teresa has been in this business for four years and will use the loan to add more money float to her business. This is her first loan with KADET LTD., and she hopes to use her profits to open other mobile money transfer shops. 

Her dreams are to become financially stable, have a large business and grant job opportunities to the youth.

loans.use: To support her mobile money transfer business by adding more money float.

loans.name: Florah

texts.en:
Florah is 35 years of age and a single mother of two children aged 13 and 11 years. She owns a boutique, a business she started 10 years ago, and earns a monthly income of 40,000 KES. 

Florah wants to restock her business and has requested a seventh loan of 70,000 KES to purchase more clothes, shoes and handbags to sell. The profit from her business will help her pay school fees for her children. 

Her dream is to one day own a vehicle and have rental houses.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes, shoes and handbags to sell.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est âgée de 41ans.Elle a pour conjoint un déclarant en douane avec 04 enfants en charge. L'ainé a 14ans et le dernier 04ans. Ils sont tous scolarisés. Pour contribuer aux besoins de la famille, elle a commencé par vendre des ustensiles de cuisine et des habits à domicile depuis 2003.  Madame Akouvi espère à l'avenir élargir sa boutique et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille. Elle sollicite un premier prêt pour acheter plus de marchandises.
texts.en:
Akouvi is 41 years old. Her spouse is a customs officer and she has four children to care for. The eldest is 14 years old and the youngest is four. They are all in school. 

To contribute to the needs of her family, she started selling kitchen utensils and clothes from her home since 2003. Mrs. Akouvi hopes in the future to expand her shop and improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a first loan to buy more goods.

loans.use: buy kitchen utensils

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 16 years old and lives in the town of Pallisa in the Iganga region of Uganda. For the past three years, Josephine has been working hard to manage her fishing business. 

To help expand her business, Josephine has requested a loan of 150,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more fish, and will help Josephine to generate greater profits and Increase her sales. Josephine hopes that in the future she will be able to start purchasing tomatoes for sale. 

Josephine is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Nzokira Group

texts.fr:
Adelaïde fait partie du groupe  Nzokira et  habite à Gitega. C’est une veuve de 52 ans. Elle a 2 enfants  âgés de 15 à 18 ans, dont 1 étudie. 

Elle fait le commerce de pommes de terre   depuis 8 ans. 

Elle est à son huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de kilos de pommes de terre à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait  voir son enfant continuer les études.
texts.en:
Adelaide is part of the Nzokira group and lives in Gitega. She is a widow of 52 years. She has two children aged 15 and 18, including one who is studying.

She has been trading potatoes for the past eight years.

She is on her eighth credit loan with Turame. With the KIVA loan she will increase her working capital and buy many kilos of potatoes for resale, to earn more.

In coming years she wants to see her child continue school.

loans.use: increase her working capital and buy many kilos of potatoes for resale, to earn more.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de condiments depuis 1992, Afi s'approvisionne à Lomé et revend sous un hangard. Mariée, elle a 04 enfants dont 03 scolarisés. Elle sollicite son premier crédit pour acheter des condiments afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Le rêve de madame Afi est d'avoir une boutique et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
A retailer of condiments since 1992, Afi buys and sells in Lome under a shed. She is married and has four children of whom three attend school.

She is requesting her first loan to buy condiments, to better meet customer needs.

Mrs. Afi's dream is to own a shop and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 70 egg-laying hens at $25.00 each and also to improve and expand her chicken house

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.fr: jacqueline est une jeune femme de 35 ans célibataire, mère d'un enfant agé de 16 ans  qui va à l'école, elle a aussi 2 autres personnes à sa charge. elle est commerçante depuis 20 ans déjà dans un marché de la place ou elle commercialise le couscous (manioc et maïs) la tomate selon les saisons. elle a de l'expérience en la matière et se debrouille assez bien. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour se déplacer et allez acheter sa marchandise à des prix bas et en grande quantité dans les villages. Ce qui lui permettra d'agrandir son activité et surtout de réaliser un bon bénéfice. profit qui l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et d'épargner pour les besoins futurs comme la scolarité.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a young 35-year-old woman, the single mother of a 16-year-old child who goes to school. She also has two other dependents.

She has been a retail merchant for the past 20 years in a local market where she sells couscous (of cassava or corn) and tomatoes depending on the seasons. She is experienced in this area of activity which she manages pretty well.

She is requesting this loan so she can travel and go buy her goods in the villages at low prices and in large quantities . This will allow her to expand her business and especially to make good profits. In turn, this will help her meet her family's needs and save for future needs such as education.

loans.use: to travel through the countryside (to buy food products)

loans.name: Sebastienne Eugenie

texts.fr: Sebastienne est une jeune femme de 32 ans,fiancée et mère de 03 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 06 et 16 ans.elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place depuis 11 ans où elle vend du piment.La petitesse de son capital l'oblige souvent à acheter deux ou trois  filets de piments pour détailler ce qui crée souvent des ruptures de stock et l'empêche de satisfaire convenablement sa clientèle qui est de plus en plus grandissante car elle est obligé d'écouler tout le stock avant de pouvoir le renouveller et d'avoir un bénéfice considérable.Elle sollicite donc ce crédit pour pouvoir acheter plus de filets(10) ce qui lui permettra de satisfaire sa clientèle, d'augmenter ses ventes et par conséquent son bénéfice.Elle réinvestira une partie de ce bénéfice dans son activité et économisera l'autre pour la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en: Sebastienne is a young woman, 32 years old, engaged to be married, and the mother of three children, from 6 to 16 years old. She has been a merchant at a local market for eleven years. Her meager capital often compels her to purchase two or three bags of chili peppers retail. Having to sell her entire inventory before being able to renew it, she often has inventory shortages which prevent her from satisfying her burgeoning customer base appropriately and from making a significant profit. So she is requesting this loan to purchase more bags (10) of chili peppers enabling her to satisfy her customer and to increase her sales and thus her profits. She will reinvest part of her profits in her business and will save the other part for her children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to buy chili peppers

loans.name: Wilfried

texts.fr: Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, monsieur Wilfried fait sa toute première demande à WAGES. Revendeur de produits d'alimentation générale(tomate en boite, sucre, lait,riz...), mr Wilfried s'approvisionne généralement à Lomé et revend à domicile. Son souhait est d'avoir un terrain pour construire et aussi améliorer le bien - être de la famille. Notons qu'il est marié avec 02 enfants de 3ans, 08 mois en charge. Mr Wilfried a une ancienneté d'01an envoisinne les 33ans.
texts.en:
To better meet the needs of his customers, Mr. Wilfried is making his very first request from WAGES. A retailer of general food products (canned tomatoes, sugar, milk, rice ...), Mr. Wilfried generally resupplies in Lome and resells at home. 

His wish is to have a plot of land where he can build and also improve his family's well-being.

Note that he is married with two children to care for, three years and 8 months old. Mr Wilfried has one year seniority and is about 33 years old.

loans.use: Buy general food products

loans.name: Kreiver

texts.es: Kreiver, de 52 años de edad, está casado con Dora y tiene 03 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Kreiver se dedica al servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi el cual se compró con el fruto de sus ahorros. Realiza esta función circulando por las principales calles de la ciudad en la que vive. Se inició hace 15 años cuando se compró su primera unidad, en el transcurso del tiempo fue renovando otras unidades a medida que iban deteriorándose por el uso cotidiano. Se inició por la necesidad de contar con un trabajo ya que no podía conseguir un empleo, ahora se siente con mayor seguridad pues puede manejar sus horarios, además de ser su propio jefe. Por lo contrario comenta que no le gusta cuando su mototaxi se malogra o sufre algunos daños de manera continúa pues le ocasiona muchos gastos, pero aun así logra ver buenos resultados, por eso tiene planes de hacer crecer su actividad de transporte y espera comprarse otro vehículo para alquilarlo y asegurar su economía. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000, se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para poder alcanzar sus objetivos.Con el monto solicitado comprará repuestos para su mototaxi y algunos accesorios para que funcione en óptimas condiciones.
texts.en:
Kreiver is 52 years old. He is married to Dora and has 3 children, with whom they live in their own home. Kreiver works transporting passengers in his mototaxi, which he purchased with his savings. He does this work driving through the main streets in the city where he lives. 

He started 15 years ago when he bought his first vehicle; over time, he renovated other vehicles as they deteriorated from daily use. He began because he needed steady work, since he wasn’t able to find a job. Now, he feels more secure because he can make his own hours, in addition to being his own boss. 

On the other hand, he says that he doesn’t like when his mototaxi breaks down or gets damaged over and over, because it costs him a lot of money. Even so, he has achieved good results; therefore, he has plans to expand his transportation business, and he hopes to buy another vehicle to rent out and secure his finances. 

With this opportunity, he will request S/. 2000. He feels grateful for the financial support that he is receiving in order to reach his goals. With the requested loan, he will purchase parts for his mototaxi and some accessories so that it runs under optimal conditions.

loans.use: to purchase parts and accessories for his mototaxi.

loans.name: Djatougbé

texts.fr: Djatougbé sollicite son second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des perles et des produits divers. Activité qu'elle mène depuis 1997 de façon ambulante. Elle est mère de 06 enfants et a pour mari un cultivateur. Âgée de 58ans, madame Djatougbé souhaite agrandir la taille de son activité et assurer une bonne condition de vie à la famille.
texts.en:
Djatougbé is requesting her second credit loan from WAGES to buy beads and various products. She has been leading this itinerant activity since 1997.

She is the mother of six children and her husband is a farmer. Mrs. Djatougbé is 58 years old and wants to expand the size of her business activity and provide good living conditions for the family.

loans.use: Buy beads and various products

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.en: Yvonne is a 41-year-old married woman  from Bien Unido, Bohol and the mother of three children. She has been engaged in the fishing business  together with her husband for more than nine years now. This is their main source of income. Yvonne is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is married and she works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Aurelia successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan in order to build and expand her general store business.

Aurelia has been in this business for 14 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Aurelia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Heang

texts.en: A rural farmer from Takeo province, Heang is the breadwinner in her family consisting of nine children.  For her, animal husbandry (raising chickens and ducks) and rice farming are the primary sources of her family's income. This business has returned her up to USD 8 per day to support her living. Heang is new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, she has to care for only one son who is studying at a local university specializing in English literature. To cover her son's tuition fee, she decided to take her first loan from VisionFund (Kiva's partner). She hopes that her son can focus on his study and get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay for her son’s tuition

loans.name: Chikanga Stars Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 47-year-old Letwin from Mutare. She is widowed with three children. She also cares for one other dependent. 

Letwin runs a retail business selling clothes, and she is a member of the Chikanga Stars group. The business has been in operation for seven years. She says the main challenges faced are high import duties at border posts and stiff competition. 

Letwin has requested a loan of $600 to buy clothes for resale in town. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to expand her business and improve her family's general welfare. In the future, Letwin plans to operate a boutique shop in town.

loans.use: to buy clothes from Mozambique and South Africa for resale.

loans.name: Taumainuumau

texts.en: Taumainuumau is 65 years old and a widow with six children. She runs a small business selling cabbages, tomatoes, oranges, ripe bananas, pawpaw, and pineapples in her community and has been doing this for 10 years. Taumainuumau has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, fertilizer, barbed wire, a wheelbarrow, a garden fork, a rake and a garden hose. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Taumainuumau will support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, fertilizer, barbed wire, a wheelbarrow, a garden fork, a rake and a garden hose

loans.name: Gafua
